title: Safety for Kid 1 - Emergency Escape
description:
You never know when an emergency will happen. Accidents can happen anytime, anywhere, and the solution to avoiding unpleasant surprises is prevention. Discover an innovative game for kid that teaches kids to improve their safety by preventing accidents and learning the basics of first aid.

Safety for Kids is proud to present 12 safety games for kid including safety tips in case of stranger come, getting lost, robber, fire escape, electric shock, earth quake, tsunami, lift trouble, drowning, social dangers, first aid procedure … that illustrates how you and your children should react when those emergency situations hits. It’s IMPORTANT for children to know what to do in such cases.

Lessons have been translated into 11 languages: Spanish, Portugese, Arabic, Russian, Korean, Japanese, French, Thai, Chinese, Vietnamese


With tips and knowledge equiped through our series, we hope that your beloved kids will have more chance to be safe when an unexpected situation happens.


HOW
This game for kid designed focus on inspirational learning, skill-building, attractive contents to our young audience will bring kids to an unique learning experience.
Teaching kids prevention means teaching them to live!

HIGHLIGHTS
1.The content of this game for kid has been evaluated by safety specialists and reference to Australian government safety programing.
2.Experience emergency in the comfort of your own world but play through the game in real-life settings. 
3.With 12 safety lessons, An emergency situation may strike when you are at home, in school, in a supermarket, and on the street… Prepare yourself safe in all cases. 
4.This game is designed for kid with Fun interactions and easy to operate .

ABOUT SAFETY FOR KIDS:
Safety for Kid is the most trusted brand of pre toddler and early age educational game. The safety game are designed and developed specifically for children.

title: 911 Operator DEMO
description:
THIS IS ONLY FREE TRIAL OF '911 OPERATOR' WITH LIMITED CONTENT! 
FOR FULL VERSION, PLEASE PURCHASE THE GAME FROM THE LINK BELOW: 
http://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.jutsugames.operator911

***
In 911 OPERATOR, you take on the role of an emergency dispatcher, who has to rapidly deal with the incoming reports. Your task is not just to pick up the calls, but also to react appropriately to the situation – sometimes giving first aid instructions is enough, at other times a police, fire department or paramedics’ intervention is a necessity. Keep in mind, that the person on the other side of the line might turn out to be a dying daughter’s father, an unpredictable terrorist, or just a prankster. Can you handle all of this?

PLAY ON ANY CITY IN THE WORLD*

Check out thousands of cities from all around the world. The Free Play mode lets you choose a city to play on - the game will download its map, along with real streets, addresses and the emergency infrastructure. You can also try the Career mode, which contains 6 cities with unique events – survive an earthquake in San Francisco and save Washington, D.C. from bomb attacks.

MANAGE TEAMS

A number of police, fire department and paramedic units are at your disposal. The forces may use a variety of vehicles (from common ambulances to police helicopters), essential equipment (e.g., bulletproof vests, first aid kits and technical tools) and consist of team members with different abilities.

PEOPLE’S LIVES ARE IN YOUR HANDS!

Main features:

- Over 50 recorded dialogues inspired by real calls: serious and dramatic, but sometimes also funny or annoying.
- Real First Aid instructions.
- Opportunity to play on any city in the world!
- 6 selected cities in Career mode, featuring unique calls and events.
- More than 140 types of reports to encounter.
- 12 types of emergency vehicles (including helicopters, police cars and motorcycles).

***
The game requires Internet connection to download free maps. The offline game is available after downloading the maps.

All map data © OpenStreetMap authors

* The term “city” is used within the meaning of OpenStreetMap service and relates to urban areas described as “city” or “town” therein.

title: Emergency Injection Simulator
description:
Little girls patient got accidental infections on their bodies and want a physician doctor to help them to cure their diseases. One girl get a road accident on her bicycle. And have a serious injury on her leg. Doctor kids please inject her and give her first aid. Second girl sit in a garden, suddenly heavy rain started and she got a cold flu. Emergency ambulance needed to take her to hospital. Third girl eat a hot soap and her tongue has burn. She also got heartburn. Care her in a private clinic. Fourth girl slip on a road while walking on a road, lost her too much blood. Surgeon needed for blood draw to check her blood group. Nurse physician needed to  inject her a drip injection.

Features of Emergency Injection Simulator
 
*** Patient girl selection.
*** Emergency Injuries clinic and hospital.
*** Diarrhea, heartburn and tongue treatment of hot soap eaten girl.
*** Flu, and cold cough treatment using thermometer, stethoscope, injection, oxygen pump and syrup.
*** Bicycle accidental injured girl's leg treatment by surgeon using cutter, bandage, tetanus injection and medicine.
*** Road accident slip girl blood draw, blood group testing and drip injection with the help of on demand doctor.
*** All Girls wants first aid treatment from doctor kids.

Download now the emergency injection simulator and start enjoying the crazy doctor games.

title: FirstVet
description:
CHAT WITH AN EXPERIENCED VET DIRECTLY ON YOUR PHONE
For those middle-of-the night emergencies, and everything else, FirstVet helps you navigate the best possible care for your pet. We’ve helped nearly half a million pet parents better understand their pet’s symptoms and direct the best course of action. Our service provides expert advice for situations when you are not sure whether a trip to the vet clinic is necessary.  

From the convenience of your own home, a vet can determine whether your pet’s symptoms require a trip to an emergency clinic visit, a non-emergent visit, or whether the symptoms can be triaged at home.

Maybe you’re wondering why your cat has suddenly lost his or her appetite? Whether your dog's vomiting or diarrhea requires immediate treatment?  We’re here to help!

BE READY - REGISTER YOUR ANIMAL NOW
By downloading the app and registering your pet in advance, you can quickly get expert help when you need it the most. Signing up is completely free and takes less than a minute.

FREE WITH SELECTED PET INSURANCE POLICIES
We will soon be partnering with insurance companies to provide this service to its members at no cost to you.  Our normal rates apply to all other customers.

OUR VETS
All of our vets are licensed and have 3+ years of experience. Here are some examples of what our vets can help your pet with:

- Vomiting and diarrhea
- Eye and ear problems
- Ingestion of potentially toxic chemicals
- Itching and skin problems
- Coughing and sneezing
- Ticks for dogs and cats
- Injuries and accidents
- Behavioral problems
- Dental care
- Rehabilitation and wellness
- Healthcare advice for horses

We are a global company with over 300,000 satisfied customers today, with 98.5% giving us a positive rating.

SEARCH THROUGH THOUSANDS OF QUESTIONS AND ANSWERS ABOUT PETS
You can also search for facts and advice about pets in our knowledge database. If you have your own specific question that you cannot find an answer to, you can submit it and get it answered by our vets, completely free of charge!

Here are some common questions:
- Is chicken dangerous for my dog?
- Can I give my cat regular milk?
- My dog ​​eats grass and vomits - is that normal?
- Is my cat sick if his or her nose is dry?
- Why do rabbits stomp their back paws?
- Should I vaccinate my rabbit?
- Which preventative tick treatment should I choose?

We will soon be partnering with insurance companies to provide this service to its members at no cost to you. Our normal rates apply to all other customers.

OUR VETS
All of our vets are licensed and have 3+ years of experience. Here are some examples of what our vets can help your pet with:

- Vomiting and diarrhea
- Eye and ear problems
- Ingestion of potentially toxic chemicals
- Itching and skin problems
- Coughing and sneezing
- Ticks for dogs and cats
- Injuries and accidents
- Behavioral problems
- Dental care
- Rehabilitation and wellness
- Healthcare advice for horses

We are a global company with over 300,000 satisfied customers today, with 98.5% giving us a positive rating.

SEARCH THROUGH THOUSANDS OF QUESTIONS AND ANSWERS ABOUT PETS
You can also search for facts and advice about pets in our knowledge database. If you have your own specific question that you cannot find an answer to, you can submit it and get it answered by our vets, completely free of charge!

Here are some common questions:
- Is chicken dangerous for my dog?
- Can I give my cat regular milk?
- My dog ​​eats grass and vomits - is that normal?
- Is my cat sick if his or her nose is dry?
- Why do rabbits stomp their back paws?
- Should I vaccinate my rabbit?
- Which preventative tick treatment should I choose?
summary: The vet on-demand service. Book a vet consultation directly from your phone.

Fantastic service, would thoroughly recommend. Usually seen very quickly, both times i have used the service the vet has been excellent.
Very knowledgeable and reassuring. Great to be able to talk to a vet on a sunday evening when my dog was worryingly poorly.
Really helpful for questions without needing to worry vets or the animal with an unnecessary visit. Very helpful in lockdown
Excellent idea. Especially in Corronaah times. Great vets, always helpful and knowledgeable.

title: Water Drinking Reminder - Water Tracker
description:
Do you drink enough water every day?
Do you always forget to drink water?

This Water Drinking Reminder is definitely what you need! 100% FREE!

Water Drinking Reminder - Water Tracker smartly reminds you to drink water every day. It helps you stay hydrated, and develop good habits of water drinking with a healthier body.

You only need to fill in information of your gender, weight, input your local weather and exercise frequency, then Water Drinking Reminder will calculate how much water you need to drink every day.

This drink water reminder app not only reminds you when it's time to replenish water, but also track your daily water intake. You can also reach your daily goal to get motivated achievements.

# Benefits of Drinking Water #
- Keep fit and lose weight
- Give you healthy skin
- Help muscle growth and recovery
- Help your body detoxify
- Promote digestion

Smart Reminder
- No disturbance. Won’t get reminders when you nap and sleep
- Customize your reminders, continue or stop receiving reminders after reaching your daily goal

Different Reminder Types
- Timed reminder: remind you at the set time
- Interval reminder: remind you according to the time interval you set

Intuitive Graph
- Record your daily water drinking
- Analyze your water drinking over day, week, month, and year
- Track your drinking water history

Daily Water Tracker
- Simple and intuitive interface, easy to use
- Diverse drinking menu, about 20 drinks to choose from
- Customize your daily goal
- Change the cup look and capacity
- Get motivated by unlocking achievement badges
- Calculate how much water you need to replenish every day based on your weight and gender
- Sync your health data with Google fit
- Backup and restore data by signing in with your Google account or Facebook account

In order to replenish water in time, a smart reminder is very necessary and helpful to our life. Download this wonderful Water Tracker for free now and share it with your family and friends! Let them join you and develop good drinking habits! We welcome your valuable feedback, your suggestions and requests are our sources of progress!

title: Dental First Aid
description:
This app provides information on what to do in case of a dental emergency.  It also features information on other services provided at Asante Dental Centre including dental implants, cosmetic dentistry and general dentistry.


Background to use inside app :

It is Sunday night and all of a sudden one of your tooth starts aching.  Do you know what you should do?  This app features information provided by dentist Dr. Hussein Shivji at Asante Dental Centre on dealing with common dental emergencies including tooth ache, swollen gums, knocked out tooth, loose crown, or cracked tooth.  The app also has information on some of the services provided by Asante Dental Centre including dental implants, cosmetic dentistry and general dentistry including contact information for patients needing a dentist in the Vancouver area.


Contact Us:

604-525-4391/604-224-6262
www.asantedental.ca  
drshivji@asantedental.ca

https://www.facebook.com/Asante-Dental-Yaletown-Vancouver-143388119089044/

title: First Aid
description:
How to Do Basic First Aid!
Basic first aid refers to the initial process of assessing and addressing the needs of someone who has been injured or is in physiological distress due to choking, a heart attack, allergic reactions, drugs or other medical emergencies. Basic first aid allows you to quickly determine a person's physical condition and the correct course of treatment. You should always seek professional medical help as soon as you are able, but following correct first aid procedures can be the difference between life and death. Follow our entire tutorial, or find specific advice by checking out the sections listed above.

     *** Support Us By Rating Us 5 Stars***
**** Please contact us if you have any question! ****

title: First Aid Help & Tutorial
description:
Download First Aid Help & Tutorial one of the best First Aid with nearby hospitals on Map using GPS Online and Works offline. 

★ What is First Aid?
First aid is the provision of immediate care to a victim with an injury or illness, usually affected by a lay person, and performed within a limited skill range. First aid is normally performed until the injury or illness is satisfactorily dealt with (treatment of major conditions such as performing CPR , stroke, heart attack or chocking, in the case of small cuts, minor bruises, and blisters) or until the next level of care, such as a paramedic or doctor or ambulance, arrives to reach nearby medical center. 

★ What is First Aid Help & Tutorial?
First Aid Help & Tutorial - Nearby Hospital is a handy app at the time of emergency. Learn all health steps before you need it. First Aid - Nearby Hospital app provides Map direction of nearest hospital at your current location. Get Map directions of nearby hospitals and make your device as Hospital tracking device on GPS Map.

 

Key guiding principles of first aid in First Aid Help & Tutorial - Nearby Hospital are-
➤ Prevent further injury
➤ Preserve life
➤ Promote recovery

Conditions that often require and included in First Aid - Nearby Hospital app:- 

★ Major
‣ Bleeding(Hand, Foot, Head Injuries)
‣ Stroke
‣ Heart Attack
‣ Chocking
‣ Seizure

★ Minor
‣ Snake Bite
‣ Bones(Fractures, Broken)
‣ Asthma
‣ Burns

★ Tips
‣ Provide Safety
Ensure safety for yourself, the casualty and bystanders.

‣ Look for Response
Look for a response, assess their signs and symptoms.

‣ Send for Help
Arrange for the ambulance to be called and send someone to obtain health related resources.

‣ First Aid
Provide first aid according to the injury or illness and within your own skills and limitations. 

★ Nearby Hospital 
Provide nearby hospitals at your current location on Map for emergency help.
Use this helpful health app as a first aid course such as CPR Training, plastering etc…

★ Features of App Of First Aid Help & Tutorial:
‣ Easy UI with Material Design
‣ Useful first aid treatment methods covered
‣ Graphics are used with every step for help

★ Coming up with more first aid activities
‣ Rate and review this app on Playstore

title: First Aid Guide
description:
"
   ★★★ Download It For Free ★★★

First aid what everybody should know!
First aid is an important skill. Find out what everyone should know!

By performing simple procedures and following certain guidelines, it may be possible to save lives by giving basic treatment until professional medical help arrives.
In an emergency there's no time to read instructions. If you've memorised some of the basic procedures, it will help you react quickly and efficiently.

If you ever find yourself in a situation where you have to administer first aid,it is important to be prepared!

title: Primeros auxilios - (First Aid in Spanish)
description:
Los primeros auxilios son un tratamiento médico que brinda ayuda de emergencia a una persona enferma o con heridas graves .
Los primeros auxilios son como la necesidad básica de su salud y condición médica. Esta Aplicación de primeros auxilios con varios temas de salud y afección médica en los que requería primeros auxilios de inmediato. Como problemas del corazón, RCP, apoplejía, ahogamiento, etc.
Esta aplicación también tiene kits de primeros auxilios que son obligatorios mientras viaja. Los botiquines de primeros auxilios lo ayudan a realizar los primeros auxilios si tiene algún problema médico o en cualquier condición médica crítica. Los botiquines de primeros auxilios contienen todo el inventario de medicamentos que puede requerir en una condición crítica mientras no tenga rescate u hospital cercano.
El objetivo principal de la aplicación es garantizar que la persona esté segura hasta que llegue al rescate. La aplicación también tiene números de emergencia en todo el mundo. Te ayuda cuando estás en un país extranjero para llegar a una emergencia rápidamente. Nuestra aplicación también proporciona un widget de llamada de emergencia que puede ser muy útil cuando tienes prisa.
Los primeros auxilios son como la necesidad básica de su vida, por lo que hemos agregado las recetas que usted requiere en condiciones médicas.
Además, su sugerencia es muy útil para nosotros y nos ayuda a mejorar nuestra aplicación. Por favor, sugiéranos o si encuentra algún error o algo inaceptable o insatisfactorio, de modo que pueda darnos sus comentarios utilizando la opción de comentarios proporcionada en nuestra aplicación.

title: Learn First Aid.
description:
Free application about everything you need to know in first aid.
First aid can save lives.
First aid consists of immediate care given to a sick, injured, or injured person. Knowing what not to do is as important as knowing what to do.
Download this app for free and you will always have it on hand if necessary, to prevent and know how to act in each case.
This free app contains tutorial videos that explain everything to you clearly and step by step without any difficulty.
In this app you will find:
🚑 First aid guide.

title: First Aid: Learning
description:
Do you know the importance of learning basic knowledge about first aid?
Sometimes life puts us before difficult situations and if we know how to act before them it will be easier to cope with them. It is the case of first aid. If we ever meet the need to help a wounded, knowing what techniques and care we should apply could help us save the life of the injured. Therefore, the importance of learning basic techniques on first aid. To provide first aid we must know what to do and what not to do. To take care of the health of the wounded we can not act without knowing basic techniques of rescue. Acting quickly and effectively could save the life of the victim so it is important to stay calm and avoid panic. The first thing you should do is protect the injured from the danger spot. Secondly, you should call the health service to come to the place as soon as possible. And, finally, put into practice those techniques and relief care to keep the victim alive until the health services arrive. Everything you do can help save life and protect the health of the victim. Therefore, knowing well the care you should use will be of vital importance.
For this, we have created an app to help you learn first aid. A very complete guide of care and first aid techniques that will help you save your life in complicated situations. Because we never know when we are going to need to help a wounded person. You must know that learning these techniques will allow you to save lives. Do not think about it, download the free app and you will have all the information to learn notions about first aid totally free.
It's never too late to learn and if it's about saving lives even less.

title: Rescuebusters : Fire & First-Aid
description:
First Aid and Fire Safety learning made fun! Do you recognise all the fire hazards and are your CPR skills up to date? Join Max Shelter and the busters to find out!

Follow your avatar in the story with their personal companion buster model G-182. The busters are talking robots which are not the brightest bunch but perhaps there is a way to change that... The story advances the more you play!

You will learn about important fire and first aid safety in school levels and then head to city missions to rescue people! The school classes for First aid go through all important situations for commoners from small wounds and the Heimlich maneuver to CPR and even brain seizure.
In the Fire school you play classes such as Fire Prevention where you must deal with dangerous household items as quickly as possible. You get to try out and recognize the proper extinguishers for initial extinguishing and play levels of exiting during fire.

Rescuebusters safety learning game is made by Finnish safety experts.
The game doesn't replace learning safety guided by a health care professional.

Please note : The first aid and fire safety is based solely upon Finnish protocols. Beware of safety and emergency protocols of your own country.

title: First Aid Cases For The USMLE Step 2 CK
description:
First Aid Cases For The USMLE Step 2 CK provides mobile healthcare practitioners with the latest in trusted clinical information for more accurate, confident and informed decision-making at point-of-care.

DESCRIPTION
Designed to provides students with the most useful and up-to-date preparation guides for the USMLE Step 2 CK.

First Aid Cases for the USMLE Step 2 is a board-oriented case resource featuring active recall questions and answers for each case, and more than 200 illustrations to relate key concepts to clinical situations. This latest update is based on the 1st edition with additional features, enhanced functionality and ongoing updates! 

Key Features:
- 250 high-yield clinical cases written by students who aced the USMLE Step 2 CK.
- Cases that emphasize board-relevant diseases and concepts.
- Commonly asked question stems on the USMLE Step 2 CK integrated into a single USMLE-style case.
- Concise yet complete explanations.
- High-yield images, diagrams, and tables complement the questions and answers.
- Organized as a perfect supplement to First Aid for the USMLE Step 2 CK.
- Over 100 stellar First Aid illustrations and clinical images.

title: First aid / Premiers Soins
description:
First aid / Premiers Soins

A comprehensive encyclopedia of all first aid and for all accidents and emergencies that may occur unexpectedly.

Developed to increase the awareness of people in non-specialized medical aspects in order to increase awareness and develop emergency capacity in case of any emergencies or sudden accidents.

The App contains:

  - Accidents and Emergencies List: with all the information and the tips you need in case of emergency.

- General Information: explain what are first aid, explaining why it is important to learn first aid, and showing the aim of first aid.

- All About Blood (NEW): Learn more about your blood and discover blood facts, types and important information about the process of blood donation.

- First Aid Kit Contents: It is important to know what should you keep in your first aid kit, you'll find out a collection of supplies and equipment that is used to give medical treatment.

recentChanges: UI bug fixes
comments: Thank you for this very helpful app. However, I would like to request a setting to see the notifications in original Korean. The English translations are actually very bad and hard to understand. There are many foreigners (like me) that can use a little Korean. With the option to see the original Korean, we can translate the parts we don't understand by ourselves. Currently, I believe most foreigners will not be able to understand the poor English translations and this could be dangerous.

EDIT: Thank you for responding! Please make it more obvious for what areas I'm getting notifications (like a map), and use regular notifications rather than your custom full-screen ones. ORIGINAL: Ridiculous. I get a full-screen notification of some "emergency" every 30min. It turns my phone on in bed and in my pocket and keeps the screen on. And the alerts are machine-translated so half the time they don't make any sense. I'm reviewing this while the COVID-19 Coronavirus outbreak is happening, but this is complete overkill. The notification "XYZ location is getting regularly disinfected" should go away, or be a regular notification, not full screen blocking everything.
Way too disruptive. Translations are not accurate. Annoying to have 15 alerts every 10 minutes.

Great to get translation of messages, but the location service doesn't work. So, I'm getting notifications from the whole country and it's running down the battery on my phone waking it up every other minute.
Good, but there are too many notices. It is interfering with my being able to use my phone.

title: Easy To Follow First Aid Guide
description:
Have you encountered an emergency situation before but you don’t have any idea what to do? You must download this app then!

Easy to Follow First Aid Guide app contains everything that you have to know during emergency situations. It includes wide range of first aid guide from common to rare cases. It is a very easy first aid guide that even users who doesn’t have a medical background can easily understand and follow the instructions.
 
APP GOAL:

To increase awareness of users through accurate, updated and easy to follow first aid guide on mobile during emergency cases.

FEATURES:

•	Caring for unconscious person- unconsciousness is a danger sign. Act immediately!
•	Bleeding- know how to stop bleeding to prevent shock
•	Wound care- this includes cleaning and bandaging wounds
•	Injuries- it comes in various types, know the basic protocol
•	Burns- firstly know how to assess the degree of burn so you know what to do accordingly

Emergencies can happen anytime, anywhere. You don’t have to be in a medical field to know first aid. Being aware of the basic first aid will save a life one day.  

Our apps are always free, works 100% offline from all android devices and perfectly easy to use.

Save a life today! Download  Easy To Follow First Aid Guide  today and educate others as well.

God bless, Share this app to your family and friends and lets all be an effective life saver.

title: First Aid - Armenia
description:
Simple free offline First aid guide in Armenian to help users handle emergency situations like bone fracture, bleeding, and general emergency. 
Our first aid guide is a simple and comprehensive collection of tips in Armenian that you can use to resolve or prevent the worsening of emergency situations like bone fracture, bleeding, and general emergency. 
Detailed descriptions of emergency situations and step-by-step first aid tips. 
Get instant access to essential first aid instructions from anywhere. 

App content: 
- Circulatory system
- Musculoskeletal system
- Wound care supplies

Coming soon: 
- Cardiopulmonary resuscitation 
- A foreign body in the airways
- Other cases

Performing first aid can save lives and can prevent dangerous conditions during emergencies before medically trained professionals arrive. 
Disclaimer: Our guide includes only first aid instructions and in no way can replace medical treatment from a professional. 

Based on videos from 2016 First aid courses by Spartak Hovhannisyan and Emergency Risk Reduction National Platform’s “First Aid Basics” book

- A foreign body in the airways
- Other cases

Performing first aid can save lives and can prevent dangerous conditions during emergencies before medically trained professionals arrive.
Disclaimer: Our guide includes only first aid instructions and in no way can replace medical treatment from a professional.

Based on videos from 2016 First aid courses by Spartak Hovhannisyan and Emergency Risk Reduction National Platform’s “First Aid Basics” book

title: First Aid
description:
First aid is the first and immediate assistance given to any person suffering from either minor or serious illness or injury, with care provided to preserve life, prevent the condition from worsening, or to promote recovery.

The aims of first aid are to preserve life, prevent harm, and promote recovery. In first aid, ABC stands for airway, breathing, and circulation.
The recovery position helps minimize further injury. First aid is vital for saving lives. A person can carry out first aid after a life-threatening incident or injury before the arrival of emergency services.

At any moment, you or someone around you could experience an injury or illness. Using basic first aid, you may be able to stop a minor mishap from getting worse. In the case of a serious medical emergency, you may even save a life. First aid can treat all sorts of minor bumps and scrapes, but you should see a doctor for more serious accidents. You may want to think about getting a first aid kit for your house or training in first aid so that you are prepared to deal with minor accidents.

First aid is not a full medical treatment.

title: First Aid 2017
description:
Accidents happens First Aid Offline App puts expert advice for everyday emergencies in your hand. Get the app and be prepared for what life brings. With simple step-by-step advice it’s never been easier to know first aid.
First Aid is designed to help you follow the right procedures in a stressful situation or support other people by giving them instructions. It is based on
illustrations, videos and short texts that show you how to take the necessary action step by step and in the right order.
Features:-

- First aid tips for heart attacks and shocks
- First aid tips for bones, joints and muscles
- First aid tips for wounds and bleeding
- First aid tips for heat injuries and seizures
- First aid tips for life saving procedures
- First aid tips for effects of heat and cold
- First aid tips for for breathing problems 
- First aid tips for poisoning scenarios
- First aid tips for emergency situations

title: First Aid
description: First aid is the assistance given to any person suffering a sudden illness or injury, with care provided to preserve life, prevent the condition from worsening, or to promote recovery. It includes initial intervention in a serious condition prior to professional medical help being available, such as performing CPR while awaiting an ambulance, as well as the complete treatment of minor conditions, such as applying a plaster to a cut. First aid is generally performed by someone with basic medical training. Mental health first aid is an extension of the concept of first aid to cover mental health.

First aid is generally performed by someone with basic medical training. Mental health first aid is an extension of the concept of first aid to cover mental health.

title: SO CAP CUU - FIRST AID SSVN
description:
First aid and Survival skills have long been educated in the curriculum, companies and community of developed countries. 
However, most of Vietnamese are not educated with this vital knowledge and skills. Most victims are not properly rescued or not given first aid before being sent to hospitals, causing a very high mortality rate in the country, and thus big loss, suffering and burden for families and the whole society. 
Our Sơ Cấp Cứu (First Aid Helper) mobile app project aims to help untrained Vietnamese people improve survivability in dangerous situations.

The app is advised by Mr. Tony Coffey, an operational Emergency Paramedic in Sydney, Australia. 
In the last 3 years, Mr. Tony has been traveling frequently to Vietnam to deliver First Aid training for Vietnamese, especially the young students. At the same time he is training a community of local volunteer first aiders who will then be provided with further trainings to be SSVN Local First Aid Trainers who help to spread first aid awareness and skills to more people.

title: First Aid Kits - Occupational Safety Inspection
description:
You are looking for a lean software application for the regular occupational safety inspection of workplaces and work equipment? You want to easily document defects and hazards? All digital and customizable to your national occupational safety and health standards?

This is the CHEQSITE app for inspecting first aid kits in accordance with DGUV, DIN, OSH & HSE PUWER regulations. Includes among others EN 13157 and DGUV Principle 13169.

Included templates / checklists: First aid kit small, first aid kit large

With the CHEQSITE applications you do on-site workplace and asset inspections much faster and more efficiently. Import your customer data from the address book or previous inspections. Use preinstalled DGUV checklists or customize the templates according to your specific needs as suggested by national OSHA, HSE, PUWER, ANSI, EHS, and further legal and company specific regulations. Assign codes / IDs to equipment and add defects or hazards. At the next inspection you simply scan them, and the equipment information is automatically applied.

At the end of the process, you create uniform reports and easily share them with your customers and partners, e.g. via cloud services or email. The inspection report contains a management summary of the inspected objects / sites as well as a detailed list of defects and hazards including photos and information, such as required actions and responsibilities.

Make your own checklists or get in touch with our special template service team. Our application experts will then create your custom checklist for you.

A CHEQSITE account is required to use this app. Our service team will be happy to assist you with the setup and use. Please also have a look at the instructions on the CHEQSITE YouTube channel.

BENEFITS

- Significant time savings with each inspection.
- Standardized inspection process & documentation.
- Improved transparency and compliance.
- Modern appearance towards customers and employees.

FUNCTIONS OVERVIEW

- Inspect on site - no Internet access required.
- Store order data, customer data and contractors.
- Document defects and hazards with photos.
- Assign and scan codes / IDs to equipment and facilities, e.g. barcodes, QR codes, etc.
- Use pre-installed checklist templates or create your own inspection lists.
- Generate uniform reports and documentation.
- Import and export data, e.g. via cloud services or in-house servers.

You wish to make a site audit, a construction snag list, or you need a complete asset management solution, our PRO software team is at your disposal. Please have a look at the service offers on our website.

The obligation to inspect workplaces and work equipment results from national laws in your country, such as the ArbSchG Arbeitsschutzgesetz in Germany, Occupational Safety and Health Act (OSHA) in the US, Health and Safety at Work Act in the UK, etc. The laws are implemented by a number of legal ordinances which in turn are further specified and supplemented by regulations, rules, and principles, e.g., the Technical Rules for Industrial Safety (TRBS), Provision and Use of Work Equipment Regulations (PUWER), etc. National laws in the EU further result from the European Union Occupational Safety and Health Act (EU-OSHA).

title: জরুরী প্রাথমিক চিকিৎসা First Aid
description:
প্রাথমিক চিকিৎসা ইংরেজি- First aid যে কোন রোগিকে ডাক্তারের কাছে নিয়ে যাওয়ার আগে সাধারণ জ্ঞানের উপর নির্ভর করে অস্থায়ী চিকিৎসা দেওয়া হয় তাই হল প্রাথমিক চিকিৎসা। আমরা রোগিকে ডাক্তারের হাসপাতালে নিয়া যাওয়ার আগে যে প্রাথমিক চিকিৎসা দিয়ে থাকি এতে কোন প্রকার যন্ত্রপাতি বা চিকিৎসা উপকরণের প্রয়োজন পড়ে না। আমাদের এই অ্যাপটিতে First aid Box এর মধ্যে কি থাকা দরকার এর সম্পর্কেও বিস্তারিত আলোচনা করা হয়েছে। এছাড়া কোন রোগের কি primary treatment দিতে হবে বলে দেওয়া হয়েছে। 

আমাদের বাংলাদেশে প্রাথমিক চিকিৎসা নেওয়াটা খুবি জরুরি কারন গ্রাম অঞ্চলে হাসপাতাল অনেক দূরে হওয়াই  First Aid Treatment খুবি জরুরি। কারন যে কোন সড়ক দুর্ঘটনা ও সাপে কামড়ালে এবং হাসপাতাল যদি দূরে থাকে আর প্রাথমিক চিকিৎসা বা first aid medical treatment যদি না পাওয়া যায় তাহলে অসুস্থ ব্যেক্তি বা রোগীকে বাঁচানো যাবে না। তাই প্রাথমিক চিকিৎসা খুবি জরুরি। এই অ্যাপটিতে প্রায় সব ধরনের সমস্যা সম্পর্কে বিস্তারিত আলোচনা করা হয়েছে। আর জানতে অ্যাপটি আজই ডাউনলোড করুন।

অ্যাপটিতে যা যা থাকছে --
দুর্যোগকালীন প্রাথমিক চিকিৎসা
আঘাতের প্রাথমিক চিকিৎসা
মাথায় আঘাত পেলে
হাপানী বা অ্যাজমা
পোকা কামড়ালে
ফার্স্ট এইড বক্স
বৈদ্যুতিক শক
জরুরী ওষুধ
হার্ট অ্যাটাক
সাপে কামড়
First Aid Emergency
সর্বমোট ২২ টি চাপটার দেওয়া হয়েছে এবং পরবর্তীতে আরও দেওয়া হবে। আমাদের অ্যাপটি ভালো লাগলে ৫ * স্টার রেটিংদিতে ভুলবেন না। আর অ্যাপটি সবার সাথে শেয়ার করবেন। This application work online and offline and totally free.Download this free first aid application. আমাদের এই অ্যাপের লিংক-

descriptionHTML:
প্রাথমিক চিকিৎসা ইংরেজি- First aid যে কোন রোগিকে ডাক্তারের কাছে নিয়ে যাওয়ার আগে সাধারণ জ্ঞানের উপর নির্ভর করে অস্থায়ী চিকিৎসা দেওয়া হয় তাই হল প্রাথমিক চিকিৎসা। আমরা রোগিকে ডাক্তারের হাসপাতালে নিয়া যাওয়ার আগে যে প্রাথমিক চিকিৎসা দিয়ে থাকি এতে কোন প্রকার যন্ত্রপাতি বা চিকিৎসা উপকরণের প্রয়োজন পড়ে না। আমাদের এই অ্যাপটিতে First aid Box এর মধ্যে কি থাকা দরকার এর সম্পর্কেও বিস্তারিত আলোচনা করা হয়েছে। এছাড়া কোন রোগের কি primary treatment দিতে হবে বলে দেওয়া হয়েছে।

আমাদের বাংলাদেশে প্রাথমিক চিকিৎসা নেওয়াটা খুবি জরুরি কারন গ্রাম অঞ্চলে হাসপাতাল অনেক দূরে হওয়াই First Aid Treatment খুবি জরুরি। কারন যে কোন সড়ক দুর্ঘটনা ও সাপে কামড়ালে এবং হাসপাতাল যদি দূরে থাকে আর প্রাথমিক চিকিৎসা বা first aid medical treatment যদি না পাওয়া যায় তাহলে অসুস্থ ব্যেক্তি বা রোগীকে বাঁচানো যাবে না। তাই প্রাথমিক চিকিৎসা খুবি জরুরি। এই অ্যাপটিতে প্রায় সব ধরনের সমস্যা সম্পর্কে বিস্তারিত আলোচনা করা হয়েছে। আর জানতে অ্যাপটি আজই ডাউনলোড করুন।

title: First Aid Study
description:
First Aid Study is designed to assist you in completing a Standard First Aid course as well as helping you reinforce the concepts you have learned from the course. It includes detailed First Aid techniques that allows you to conduct yourself as a better first aider complete with the proper treatments for patients.

Features:
 - Studying Progress
 - Quiz Progress
 - 7 total quizzes
 - 51 total topics 
 - Quick injury recognition and treatments

This app was developed as a project and I do not own any of the content. All information is taken from the St. John Ambulance Standard First Aid handbook online and icons are taken from icons8.com and flaticon.com

title: Life Saving First Aid App
description: This application (Life Saving First Aid App) is made because there are many life  threatening  emergencies faced by people every day. So, they should be aware of the method of dealing with them. If we searched about the emergencies on Google then it will show many websites which may lead to confusion and sometimes wrong information also. This app will help in giving correct and accurate information to the person at the right time. This app contains authentic and genuine information prepared in the form of module by Dr.Saurabh Dalal[(Consultant) Medical Preparedness and Biological Disasters],  National Disaster Management Authority (NDMA) (Ministry of Home Affairs , Government of India). For more information please visit“https://www.ndma.gov.in/images/pdf/FirstAid%20-MODULE.pdf” and “thebetterindia.com”.

title: Learn CPR!
description:
Learn CPR! is designed to help you learn CPR or brush up on your CPR skills. With clear and easy guides for adult, child, infant, and even pet CPR, video demonstrations of proper techniques, and tips on what to do when someone is choking, Learn CPR! will help you gain the knowledge you need to become certified in CPR or become more aware of what to do in case of an emergency.

FEATURES:

*Adult, child, infant, and pet CPR guides
*First aid for choking adults, children, and infants
*Video demonstrations
*CPR course finder to help you get certified
*CPR FAQ to answer common questions


**DISCLAIMER: This information is not intended as a substitute for professional medical advice, emergency treatment or formal first-aid training. Don't use this information to diagnose or develop a treatment plan for a health problem or disease without consulting a qualified health care provider. If you're in a life-threatening or emergency medical situation, seek medical assistance immediately. Sterling App Development does not in any manner endorse, assume responsibility for, or recommend the use of any drug or treatment method described in this app. This app uses Google Analytics to anonymously track usage data within the application.**

title: First Aid for the USMLE Step 2 CK, Tenth Edition
description:
The most comprehensive and up-to-date high-yield review available for the USMLE® Step 2 CK ---- completely revised and better than ever!

The expert author team that guided students to success on the USMLE® Step 1 presents the latest edition of this skill-sharpening review for the USMLE® Step 2 CK. With an easy-to-follow bulleted presentation of must-know diseases and disorders, this one-of-a-kind study companion offers the most current overview of all core areas on the boards. Included is a host of learning tools, from key facts and mnemonics to full-color illustrations and proven test-taking strategies—everything students need to pass the exam with flying colors.

Tenth Edition features:
• Co-written by students who excelled on the recent exam and reviewed by top faculty 
• Concise summaries of more than 1,000 commonly tested clinical topics for fast, high-yield study
• Key Facts and mnemonics reinforce must-know concepts
• Expert coverage of best initial steps in diagnosis and management 
• Updated Rapid Review section facilitates last-minute cramming
• Hundreds of full-color photographs and illustrations 
• Revised study and test-taking strategies
• A completely updated listing of top-rated review sources 

INSIDER ADVICE FOR STUDENTS FROM STUDENTS

This app is very intuitive and easy to navigate, allowing you to browse the contents or search for topics. The powerful search tool gives you word suggestions that appear in the text as you type, so it is lightning fast and helps with spelling those long medical terms. The search tool also keeps a recent history of past search terms so you can go back to a previous search result very easily. You have the ability to create notes and bookmarks separately for text, images and tables to enhance your learning. You can also change the text size for easier reading.

After the app has been downloaded, no internet connection is needed to retrieve the content of the app. All of the text and images are available to you on your device anytime, anywhere, and lightning fast. This app is also automatically optimized for whatever size device you are currently using, either phone or tablet. 


This interactive app contains the full content of First Aid for the USMLE Step 2 CK (Clinical Knowledge), Tenth Edition by McGraw-Hill Education.
ISBN-13: 978-1260440294
ISBN-10: 126044029X

Editors:
TAO LE, MD, MHS
VIKAS BHUSHAN, MD
MANIVER DEOL, MD
GABRIEL REYES, MD, PhD


Disclaimer: This app is intended for the education of healthcare professionals and not as a diagnostic and treatment reference for the general population. 


Developed by Usatine Media 
Richard P. Usatine, MD, Co-President, Professor of Family & Community Medicine, Professor of Dermatology and Cutaneous Surgery, University of Texas Health San Antonio 
Peter Erickson, Co-President, Lead Software Developer

title: First Aid Techniques
description:
First aid is the first and immediate assistance given to any person suffering from either a minor or serious illness or injury, with care provided to preserve life, prevent the condition from worsening, or to promote recovery.
First aid refers to the emergency or immediate care you should provide when a person is injured or ill until full medical treatment is available. For minor conditions, first aid care may be enough. For serious problems, first aid care should be continued until more advanced care becomes available.
First aid is vital for saving lives.

First aid varies according to the needs of the victim and according to the knowledge of the rescuer. Knowing what not to do is as important as knowing what to do, because a poorly applied therapeutic measure can lead to serious complications. For example, in acute appendicitis a mild laxative may endanger the patient's life.

title: প্রাথমিক চিকিৎসা first aid treatment
description:
অনেক সময় এমন কিছু অসুখ বা পরিস্থিতির সৃষ্টি হয়,যেখানে ডাক্তার নেই, যখন সঙ্গে সঙ্গে রোগীকে হাসপাতালে বা চিকিৎসকের শরণাপন্ন করা যায় না। তখন প্রয়োজন হয় নিজেদের ঘরে বসে প্রাথমিক চিকিৎসা।কোনো ব্যক্তি আকস্মিকভাবে আহত বা অসুস্থ হলে তাৎক্ষণিকভাবে যে চিকিৎসাসেবা প্রদান করতে হয় তাকে বলা হয় প্রাথমিক চিকিৎসা (First Aid)। প্রাথমিক চিকিৎসা এর অভাবে অনেক ক্ষেত্রে আক্রান্ত ব্যক্তির মৃত্যু কিংবা পঙ্গুত্ব হতে পারে। আমাদের এর অ্যাপটি মূলত সাজানো হয়েছে ডাক্তার পরামর্শ অনুযায়ী যেকোনো আকস্মিক সমস্যা যেমন,সাপে কাটার প্রাথমিক চিকিৎসা,পা মচকালে যা করবেন ,পায়ে ফোস্কা পড়লে করনীয়,কানে সমস্যা হলে কানে ভোঁ ভোঁ শব্দ ,ব্যাথা দূর করার উপায় সমূহ ইত্যাদি এর প্রাথমিক চিকিৎসা বা স্বাস্থ্য কথা।আশা করব অ্যাপটি খুবই সাহায্যকারী হবে । আসুন দেখে নেই কি কি পাচ্ছি অ্যাপ টি থেকেঃপ্রাথমিক চিকিৎসা প্রশিক্ষণ,প্রাথমিক চিকিৎসার গুরুত্ব,প্রাথমিক চিকিৎসার লক্ষ্য,প্রাথমিক চিকিৎসার উপকরণ বা প্রাথমিক চিকিৎসা কাকে বলে ও প্রাথমিক চিকিৎসা পদ্ধতি।

Minor injuries happen every day, and most are easy to treat at home. But to handle them quickly and calmly, you need to know what to do and have the right supplies.In this app we have tried to cover up First Aid Guide,Latest Basic First Aid Book or First Aid Bangla. There are Easy First Aid suggestions on First Aid Emergency,Baby and Child First Aid  etc.Everyone should be concerned about it. And in order to own safety some stuffs like First Aid box and First Aid Medicines should be keep close to us. This app is build mainly on this major topic,hope that everyone will love it.

title: የመጀመሪያ ህክምና እርዳታ First Aid
description:
የድንገተኛ አደጋና የመጀመሪያ የህክምና እርዳታ
Emergency and First Aid Essentials Android App

ይህ  የድንገተኛ አደጋና የመጀመሪያ የህክምና እርዳታ የተሰኘ የአንድሮይድ ሞባይል አፕሊኬሽን በኛ ወይም በአከባቢያችን ሳናስበዉ ሊከሰት የሚችልን ድንገተኛ አደጋዎች በተመለከተና በአደጋዉ ጊዜ ምን ማድረግ  እንዳለብን መሠረታዊ ግንዛቤ የሚያስጨብጥ አፕሊኬሽን ነዉ፡፡ የየእለት ኑሮ ዉስጥ ለተለያዩ ድንገተኛ  አደጋዎች ልንጋለጥ እንችላለን፡፡ በትራንስፖርት ላይ ወደ ስራም ሆነ ሌላ ቦታ ስንሄድ ድንገተኛ አደጋ ቢያጋጥመን ወይም አደጋ የደረሰባቸዉን ሰዎች በመንገድ ላይ  ብናይ  ምን ማድረግና እንዴት መርዳት እንዳለብን ከዚህ ሞባይል አፕሊኬሽን መሠረታዊ ግንዛቤ ያገኛሉ፡፡

አፕሊኬሽኑ በአደጋ ጊዜም ሆነ በፊት ምን ማድረግ እንዳለብን እንዲሁም  እንዴት ለአደጋዉ መፍትሄ ልናበጅለት እንደምንችል ያስተምረናል፡፡ በተጨማሪም አንድ አደጋ የደረሰበትን ሰዉ ሲያጋጥመን  ለዚህ ሰዉዮ ምን አይነት እርዳታ እናደርግለታለን? እንዴት እንረዳዋለን የሚሉትን ጥያቄዎች በከፊል መልስ ከዚህ የድንገተኛ አደጋና የመጀመሪያ የህክምና እርዳታ አሰጣጥ አፕሊኬሽናችን ታገኙታላችሁ ፡፡

በዚህ  አፕሊኬሽን  ያካተትናቸዉ  ርዕሶች፡-የመኪና አደጋ ሲደርስ፣ የእሳት አደጋ፣ የእሳት ማጥፊያ መሳሪያ አጠቃቀም፣ የመጀመሪያ የህክምና እርዳታ፣ መድማት፣ ነስር፣ ድንገተኛ የስኳር ህመም፣ እስትሮክ፣ ቃጠሎ፣ ጭንቀት፣ በኤሌክትሪክ ለተያዘ፣ በጥይት  መመታት፣ የጭንቅላት ግጭት ወይም ጉዳት፣ ማንቀጥቀጥ ወይም የሚጥል በሽታ፣ የአስም ሕመም፣ የልብ ህመም የተሰኙት አደጋዎች ሲከሰቱ እንዴት እርዳታ መስጠት እንዳለብን  ያብራራል፡፡

አስተያየት ካላቹ በኢ-ሜይል oromnetplc@gmail.com ላኩልን፡፡ አፕሊኬሽኑ ወደፊት ተጨማሪ መረጃዎችን አካቶ በየጊዜው ይሻሻላል፡፡ የተጠቃሚዎች አስተያየት እና ፍላጎትን ባማከለ መልኩ አፕሊኬሽኑን ለማሻሻል እንተጋለን፡፡ እባክዎን አስተያየታችሁ አይለየን። 

ልብ ይበሉ! ይህ አፕሊኬሽን በማንበብ ጥሩ ግንዛቤ ታገኛላችሁ፤ ንባብ ብቻውን በቂ አይደለም፡፡ በተጨማሪም የኢትዮጲያ ቀይ መስቀል ማህበር እንዲሁም ሌሎች ድርጅቶች የሚሰጡትን የመጀመሪያ የህክምና እርዳታ ስልጠና እንድትወስዱ እናሳስባለን፡፡ ምክንያቱም እያንዳንዱን ለአደጋ የሚሰጥ እርዳታ በተግባር የታገዘ ስልጠ ሲጨመርበት የተሸለ ዉጤት ያስገኛል፡፡ ለራስም ሆነ ለቤተሰብ እንዲሁም ለማህበረሰብም ስለ እርዳታ አሰጣጥ ማወቅ ለሁሉም ይጠቅማል፡፡

አንዴ ሞባይላችን ላይ ከጫንን ቡኋላ በኦፍላይን  ልንጠቀም እንችላለን፡፡ ለአጠቃቀም ምቹ ስለሆነ ሞባይልዎ ላይ ጭነዉ ይጠቀሙበት፡፡ 

አፕሊኬሽናችንን ስለተጠቀሙ እናመሰግናለን!


Please rate our app in the Google Play store.

Thank you for downloading, 

ኦሮምኔት የሶፍትዌር እና የሞባይል አፕልኬሽን ዲቬሎፕመንት PLC ነቀምቴ ኢትዮጵያ
OROMNET Software and Application Development PLC, Nekemtie, Ethiopia
descriptionHTML:
የድንገተኛ አደጋና የመጀመሪያ የህክምና እርዳታ
Emergency and First Aid Essentials Android App

ይህ የድንገተኛ አደጋና የመጀመሪያ የህክምና እርዳታ የተሰኘ የአንድሮይድ ሞባይል አፕሊኬሽን በኛ ወይም በአከባቢያችን ሳናስበዉ ሊከሰት የሚችልን ድንገተኛ አደጋዎች በተመለከተና በአደጋዉ ጊዜ ምን ማድረግ እንዳለብን መሠረታዊ ግንዛቤ የሚያስጨብጥ አፕሊኬሽን ነዉ፡፡ የየእለት ኑሮ ዉስጥ ለተለያዩ ድንገተኛ አደጋዎች ልንጋለጥ እንችላለን፡፡ በትራንስፖርት ላይ ወደ ስራም ሆነ ሌላ ቦታ ስንሄድ ድንገተኛ አደጋ ቢያጋጥመን ወይም አደጋ የደረሰባቸዉን ሰዎች በመንገድ ላይ ብናይ ምን ማድረግና እንዴት መርዳት እንዳለብን ከዚህ ሞባይል አፕሊኬሽን መሠረታዊ ግንዛቤ ያገኛሉ፡፡

አፕሊኬሽኑ በአደጋ ጊዜም ሆነ በፊት ምን ማድረግ እንዳለብን እንዲሁም እንዴት ለአደጋዉ መፍትሄ ልናበጅለት እንደምንችል ያስተምረናል፡፡ በተጨማሪም አንድ አደጋ የደረሰበትን ሰዉ ሲያጋጥመን ለዚህ ሰዉዮ ምን አይነት እርዳታ እናደርግለታለን? እንዴት እንረዳዋለን የሚሉትን ጥያቄዎች በከፊል መልስ ከዚህ የድንገተኛ አደጋና የመጀመሪያ የህክምና እርዳታ አሰጣጥ አፕሊኬሽናችን ታገኙታላችሁ ፡፡

በዚህ አፕሊኬሽን ያካተትናቸዉ ርዕሶች፡-የመኪና አደጋ ሲደርስ፣ የእሳት አደጋ፣ የእሳት ማጥፊያ መሳሪያ አጠቃቀም፣ የመጀመሪያ የህክምና እርዳታ፣ መድማት፣ ነስር፣ ድንገተኛ የስኳር ህመም፣ እስትሮክ፣ ቃጠሎ፣ ጭንቀት፣ በኤሌክትሪክ ለተያዘ፣ በጥይት መመታት፣ የጭንቅላት ግጭት ወይም ጉዳት፣ ማንቀጥቀጥ ወይም የሚጥል በሽታ፣ የአስም ሕመም፣ የልብ ህመም የተሰኙት አደጋዎች ሲከሰቱ እንዴት እርዳታ መስጠት እንዳለብን ያብራራል፡፡

አስተያየት ካላቹ በኢ-ሜይል oromnetplc@gmail.com ላኩልን፡፡ አፕሊኬሽኑ ወደፊት ተጨማሪ መረጃዎችን አካቶ በየጊዜው ይሻሻላል፡፡ የተጠቃሚዎች አስተያየት እና ፍላጎትን ባማከለ መልኩ አፕሊኬሽኑን ለማሻሻል እንተጋለን፡፡ እባክዎን አስተያየታችሁ አይለየን።

ልብ ይበሉ! ይህ አፕሊኬሽን በማንበብ ጥሩ ግንዛቤ ታገኛላችሁ፤ ንባብ ብቻውን በቂ አይደለም፡፡ በተጨማሪም የኢትዮጲያ ቀይ መስቀል ማህበር እንዲሁም ሌሎች ድርጅቶች የሚሰጡትን የመጀመሪያ የህክምና እርዳታ ስልጠና እንድትወስዱ እናሳስባለን፡፡ ምክንያቱም እያንዳንዱን ለአደጋ የሚሰጥ እርዳታ በተግባር የታገዘ ስልጠ ሲጨመርበት የተሸለ ዉጤት ያስገኛል፡፡ ለራስም ሆነ ለቤተሰብ እንዲሁም ለማህበረሰብም ስለ እርዳታ አሰጣጥ ማወቅ ለሁሉም ይጠቅማል፡፡

አንዴ ሞባይላችን ላይ ከጫንን ቡኋላ በኦፍላይን ልንጠቀም እንችላለን፡፡ ለአጠቃቀም ምቹ ስለሆነ ሞባይልዎ ላይ ጭነዉ ይጠቀሙበት፡፡

title: Eerste hulp - (First Aid in Dutch)
description:
Eerste hulp is een medische behandeling die een noodhulp biedt aan een persoon die ziek is of ernstig gewond raakt.
Eerste hulp is als de basisbehoefte van uw gezondheid en medische toestand. Deze EHBO-app met meerdere onderwerpen van gezondheid en medische toestand waarin u onmiddellijk eerste hulp vereiste. Zoals hartproblemen, reanimatie, beroerte, verdrinking etc.
Deze app heeft ook EHBO-sets die verplicht zijn terwijl je op reis bent. EHBO-sets helpen u bij het uitvoeren van eerste hulp als u een medisch probleem hebt of in kritieke medische omstandigheden. EHBO-sets bevatten de volledige medicatie-inventaris die u mogelijk in kritieke toestand nodig hebt terwijl u geen redding of ziekenhuis in de buurt heeft.
Het belangrijkste doel van de app is ervoor te zorgen dat de persoon veilig blijft tot hij / zij bij de redding is. De app heeft ook noodnummers over de hele wereld. Het helpt je wanneer je in het buitenland bent om snel een noodgeval te bereiken. Onze app biedt ook een widget voor noodoproepen die erg handig kan zijn wanneer u echt haast hebt.
Eerste hulp is als de basisbehoefte van je leven, dus we hebben de voorschriften die je nodig hebt in medische toestand toegevoegd.
Uw suggestie is bovendien erg nuttig voor ons en helpt ons om onze app beter voor u te maken, stel ons voor of als u een fout of iets onaanvaardbaars of onbevredigend vindt, zodat u ons feedback kunt geven via de feedbackoptie in onze app.

title: Learn first aid
description:
To learn everything about cardiopulmonary resuscitation and first aid you just have to download this application that contains tutorials and complete basic courses about it and that will help you save lives or at least, to prevent possible accidents and not make mistakes
. These first aid are some basic procedures and techniques that can be used to care for a sick or injured person until the arrival of health services. These procedures can save your life or make your injury less serious.
With the advice and courses of this free application you can access these much-needed practices in any job as we should all learn them. Because, do we really know what to do in case of an accident or a fracture, for example? If your answer is no, do not forget to see this app where you will find tutorials on first aid with adults, with children, how to prepare your own kit, and even how to care for your pet in case of emergency.
The issue of prevention or resuscitation is fundamental today whatever your job or work because you can save the life of someone who is in a critical situation. Even sometimes we make mistakes because we lack the necessary knowledge, to avoid this, download this app to learn correctly with the courses and advice on resuscitation.
To learn everything about preventing and not having errors follow the tips that appear in this app completely free and that is constantly renewed.

title: Learn First Aid.
description:
Free application about everything you need to know in first aid.
First aid can save lives.
First aid consists of immediate care given to a sick, injured, or injured person. Knowing what not to do is as important as knowing what to do.
Download this app for free and you will always have it on hand if necessary, to prevent and know how to act in each case.
This free app contains tutorial videos that explain everything to you clearly and step by step without any difficulty.
In this app you will find:
🚑 First aid guide.
🚑 First aid classes.
🚑 10 first aid tricks we all do wrong.
🚑 First aid, cardiopulmonary resuscitation.
🚑 In traffic accidents, what to do and what not to do.
🚑 Bleeding.
🚑 Learn first aid for pets ...
Many more courses and tips that will help you know how to act on each occasion.
With this free app you will increase your knowledge regarding first aid, in an emergency situation you will know how to act, and you will still have security of what you should do.
With the videos contained in this app, it acts as a toilet while the doctor arrives.
It is very important to have first aid knowledge, we should all have it, we can save lives with these free videos.
These videos will be renewed periodically so you can learn new things
Download this free application, essential that we should all have on hand.
It can be of great help to you !!!
Download this application for free.

title: Guide to learn first aid
description:
What are the main reasons why it is important to know first aid?

- You can save someone else's life. It is the most important cause of all of them, if you are prepared, you can prevent the person from dying because of the injuries that have occurred.
- You can avoid an incapacity. A correct first aid application will prevent further injuries that have already occurred.
- Reassure and alleviate the suffering of the victim.

Life, sometimes, puts us in situations of vital emergency. For this, we must be prepared. It is very important to know basic notions of first aid to act in these complicated situations.
You can depend on another person's life.
If you find a person with a hemorrhage, with a choking. . . It is important to know how to do things well, therefore, you have to learn first aid. First aid encompasses those measures that are initially adopted before a person who has been injured or who has become ill imminently. These measures are carried out at the scene, until specialized medical assistance is presented.
Do not forget to avoid panic and precipitation.
We have created an app that contains explanatory videos to learn lessons about first aid completely free for you.
An application that provides first aid information for all. Simple and easy to use, this application is a must on your Android device.

and cardiorespiratory arrest using the Automatic External Defibrillator

hospital environment and require first aid to be instituted early. For this, the
orientation for the people who will perform such care are primordial for the
entire population starting with the children.

title: Easy First Aid
description:
Have you ever come across an injured person?, maybe a friend  or a loved one  and really wished to help him or her out of the problem but due to the fact that you are not a trained health professional you end up being stuck on what to do, then AfyaHelp is the answer for you.
AfyaHelp is a simple app designed to help you provide a  quick FIRST AID to an injured or critically ill person as you wait for medical assistance. For that moment of waiting, if spent effectively could end up saving life
How it works
In the launcher screen the user will be required to select a general category of help he or she needs for example, Bites and Sting. In the next activity that appears he or she will be required to select a more specific type of help for example, Snake Bite, Spider Bite etc  and the activity that appears will contain advice on how to provide first aid to the injured person.
Why AfyaHelp??
-The written contents in the app are easy and simple to understand.
-The contents in the app are clearly categorized in order to help the user easily access the help he or she -needs
-It has a rich use of images which makes it  lively and interesting to use and also enables the user to visualize on what is being talked about   
;

comments: Gives step by step instruction for basic emergencies, covers a lot more potential emergencies than other first aid apps. Could use improvements however- could have pictures demonstrating what to, also could describe in further detail certain treatments; for example, recovery position. Lets say it says to put patient in recovery position- but doesn't give explanation of doing so. What if someone doesn't know? So yes, app is better than average, but could use some updating with improvements.

title: Dental Trauma First Aid
description:
First Aid Dental Trauma - Knowledge is lacking among the general population in how to take care of a dental trauma at the scene of an accident. What to do when the tooth is loose? When several teeth are damaged or misplaced? What if it is primary teeth?
For a totally knocked out tooth your first aid could be of vital importance to save the tooth. The Dental Trauma app will help parents, teachers, sport coaches and others to give the best first aid to persons suffering from Dental Trauma. This app shows what to do, and if a visit to a dentist could be delayed or not, when a fragment of the crown is fractured, when there is increased mobility or dislocation of a tooth, or in case of a completely knocked out tooth. It is a great medical guide informing what actions to take at the scene of a dental accident. 

This app is endorsed by IADT (International Association of Dental Traumatology)

Keywords: dental trauma, dental trauma app, tooth injury app, dental injury app, tooth trauma app, tooth accident app, dental accident app, traumatic tooth injury app
dental trauma first aid, dental first aid app

title: First Aid Treatments
description:
First aid treatments is the app  for all kind of situation First aid is the first and immediate assistance given to any person suffering from either a minor or serious illness or injury, with care provided to preserve life, prevent the condition from worsening, or to promote recovery.,
At any moment, you or someone around you could experience an injury or illness. Using basic first aid, you may be able to stop a minor mishap from getting worse. In the case of a serious medical emergency, you may even save a life.

title: Tricks to learn first aid 💊♿➕🤧🆕🆘
description:
🆘 From here we reveal the TIPS and tricks to help a patient who needs  first aid of the red cross 
🤕 When someone has the symptoms of a heart attack or angina we have to be prepared to know how to act.
🤒  Emergencies is something of vital importance  and we all have to know how to act in certain accidents.
🆕 If you see someone who has had an accident and needs help you can keep him alive by applying basic first aid, doing cardio pulmonary resuscitation or rcp.
🤧 We will teach you how to do the  heimlich  maneuver if someone chokes or is suffocating.
💪 With our videos we aim to relieve the pain of the patient until the health services arrive.
➕ We have videos to learn how to solve cases of:
- Poisoning
- Choking the heimlich maneuver
- Burns
- CPR Pulmonary Cardio Resuscitation
- Hemorrhages
- Sprains and fractures
- Heat stroke and heat dehydration
- Lipotimia (fainting) and coma
- What to do in earthquakes and earthquakes
- Bites

🔬 This type of  first aid is basic  so that we all know them and it would be convenient to share our app on your social networks so that we are all well prevented.
💉 It is an application that includes the  most necessary videos to apply to a wound or some sting. 
💊 Always be careful with the patient, if we have a deep cut caused by an accident we will tell you in our videos the correct way to proceed to cover the wound.
♿  We also have videos of burns or splashes of some type of acid. 
You just have to look for the corresponding first aid video to be able to apply a quick solution.
 heart attacks  are something that unfortunately ends the lives of many people, but with our application we teach you to fight it and try to avoid them.
We do simulations so that  you can share our videos on facebok so that everyone knows how to act against any unforeseen event. 
What are you waiting to download this first aid application.
All diseases can be prevented and with our app we can know how to act against any domestic accident.
If you have any chest pain or have broken a leg, it is advisable to have this app so they can give you basic emergency  aid. 
 All our videos are created by way of learning so you can apply it to daily life. 
Share your progress on facebok or your wassap contacts.
Every day we review our videos of  basic first aid  we review them so that you always have the latest rescue techniques of a person.

title: First Aid For Cats & Dogs
description:
This e-book, "First Aid for Dogs & Cats - A Pet Owner's Guide", is approved by licensed veterinarians and will provide additional credible links which will show you proven lifesaving techniques.  As a veterinary technician with experience administering "in the field" emergency response, I've created this guide to give pet owners the confidence and ability to recognize emergencies and do everything possible to help your pets.
Additionally, 10% of your purchase goes directly towards building a rescue/rehab facility for domestic animals in Nosara, Costa Rica through the nonprofit organization Amor Animales de Nosara.

title: Medical Emergencies - First Aid
description:
This offline app helps you to prepare yourself to provide assistance to any person suffering a serious illness or injury,  with care provided to preserve life.

It includes initial intervention in a serious condition prior to professional medical help being available, such as performing cardiopulmonary resuscitation (CPR) while awaiting an ambulance, as well as the complete treatment of minor conditions.

Features
- Works Offline
- Treatments are categorized as per topics
- Simple and easy to use
- Share the treatment with family, friends and loved ones.

description:
সুস্থ ও সুন্দর জীবন আমরা সকলেই চাই কিন্তু তারপর আমাদের জীবনে চলার পথে অনেক সময় অনেক ধরেনের দুর্ঘটনা ঘটে যায় ।দুর্ঘটনা থেকে যাতে কোন ব্যাক্তির গুরুতর অবস্থার অবনতি না ঘটে সে জন্য প্রাথমিক চিকিৎসা অতি গুরুত্বপূর্ণ।

প্রাথমিক চিকিৎসা(First Aid Treatment) অ্যাপ থেকে আপনি আমাদের দৈনন্দিন জীবনে আমরা যেসব রোগে আক্রান্ত হই তার প্রাথমিক চিকিৎসা সমন্ধে জানতে পারবেন এবং কি করতে হবে তা জানতে পারবেন।

title: Learn first aid actions
description:
The importance of having basic knowledge in first aid can save lives at critical moments, learn how to react to a choking, an accident, an electric shock or a heart attack while the ambulance arrives with a doctor, can be crucial for life in accidents .
In our application we teach you what you can and can not do in an emergency (cardiopulmonary resuscitation ... etc) and how to help the victim while help arrives for his transfer to the hospital and be helped by the medical staff.
What you have to keep in mind are some basic steps:
1- Keep control, do not lose your cool.
2- Before giving first aid assess the accident area and ensure there are no risks to your life and that of others.
3-Check the status of the victim and if it is an emergency (consciousness, breathing and circulation) wounds check to see if it responds.
4-Ask for help notify the ambulance of your situation and emergency caused by accidents.
5-In case of suffocation (maneuver maneuver of Heimlich is for when someone who chokes and in minutes can lose his life.
6-Basic cardiopulmonary resuscitation (CPR) is the maneuver to help when the heart has stopped (consists of a combination of chest compressions and compressions that give an external cardiac massage.
We must also know that the wounds, blows, scratches ... etc should be applied and cleaned with cold water and before fractures immobilize while the ambulance arrives.
The wounds that cause bleeding should apply compression with a gauze and never remove the first one although it is stained with blood, simply apply another clean one on it.
In our application you will find all these tips on cardiopulmonary resuscitation and first aid with very clear videos about beatings, in general how to act in accidents with the victims until the ambulance arrives with the doctor or the health expert in the field.

title: First Aid বা প্রাথমিক চিকিৎসা ~ রোগের চিকিৎসা
description:
নানাবিধ রোগের উপসর্গ ও তার প্রতিকার” নামক অ্যাপ টিতে বিভিন্ন রোগের উপসর্গ অর্থাৎ রোগের লক্ষন ও তার প্রতিকার বা রোগ হলে কি কি চিকিৎসা নেওয়া উচিত তা নিয়ে বিস্তারিত আলোচনা করা হয়েছে। যে কোন রোগের ক্ষেত্রে রোগের চিকিৎসা নেওয়ার আগে রোগের লক্ষন, রোগের কারন, রোগের উপসর্গ সম্পর্কে জেনে নেওয়া উচিত।

Symptoms of Various Diseases and Its Remedies" named app discussed in detailed about various types of diseases and their symptom, cause and effects. We also discussed what actual/natural remedies there are for those diseases. Disease Medicines will not help you unless you know the actual Disease cause behind the disease.

আমরা প্রতিনিয়ত বিভিন্ন রোগ দ্বারা আক্রান্ত হয়ে থাকি এবং রোগের লক্ষন বা উপসর্গ না জেনেই নানাবিধ রোগের চিকিৎসা নিয়ে থাকি,যা কিনা ভয়ংকর। এই অ্যাপ টিতে সেইসব রোগের কারণ ও রোগের Treatment সম্পর্কে সঠিক তথ্য দেয়া হয়েছে।

In our day to day life we get affected by many diseases and take irrelevant medicines without knowing the actual cause behind the disease which is dangerous. We tried to provide the necessary disease information so that you can understand which disease affected you and what disease treatment to take.

জটিল রোগ দ্বারা আক্রান্ত ? আর নেই চিন্তা !!

Affected by Complex Diseases ??? No Worry !!!!

নানাবিধ রোগের উপসর্গ ও তার প্রতিকার” অ্যাপটি আপনাদের জন্য নিয়ে এসেছে একশর অধিক রোগের সমাধান। অ্যাপটির সূচিপত্রে সকল রোগের নাম ,রোগের উপসর্গ ও রোগের সঠিক চিকিৎসা দেয়া আছে। ক্লিক করে জেনে নিন আপনার রোগের প্রয়োজনীয় চিকিৎসা।

This "Symptoms of Various Diseases and Its Remedies" app brings you solution of over hundreds of diseases. Click on the menu button and select the disease you want to know solution about. You will see name of the diseases and their symptoms, causes and disease remedies,disease solutions, First Aid and disease treatment.

আমাদের অ্যাপ গুলি ভালো লাগলে অবশ্যই ৫ * স্টার রেটিং দিয়ে অনুপ্রেরনা দিবেন। ধন্যবাদ...।।

app download link is here--

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.healthapps.firstaid

title: FirstAid
description:
New FirstAid App is a handy, quick-reference guide with easily accessible step-by-step guidance.

The immediate treatment that is given to the victim of an accident or sudden illness before any medical help arrives is called “FirstAid”. Emergency care is required at any time in life and first aid provided at right time not only saves life but also prevents damage of essential parts of the body. It includes initial action in a serious condition prior to professional medical help being available, such as performing CPR while awaiting an ambulance, as well as the complete treatment of minor conditions, such as applying a plaster to a cut. FirstAid is generally performed by the layperson, with many people trained in providing basic levels of first-aid. Mental health first aid is an extension of the concept of first aid to cover mental health.

Aims of FirstAid:
    •    It saves Life.
    •    Helps in early recovery.
    •    Prevent worsening of the victim’s condition.
    •    To reduce pain and sufferings.

Many lives are saved year through first aid, given before the emergency services arrived.Almost everyone will need to use a first aid kit at some time. FirstAid kits may be basic or comprehensive. What you need depends on your medical training and your distance from professional medical help. Ready-made first aid kits are commercially available from stores ,but it’s easy to make smart, inexpensive first aid kits yourself. This app includes the latest first aid advice and protocols for dealing with emergency situations. It is simple to follow with illustrated guides and instructions.

Contents:

-  Instructions for Cardiopulmonary resuscitation(Adults)
-  Instructions for Cardiopulmonary resuscitation(baby)
-  Instructions for Dealing Emergency cases
-  Instructions for stress firstaid
-  Instructions for Hand washing
-  Instructions for Training

 This FirstAid app provides the necessary steps to be taken for the treatment of various diseases such as Asthma, Bleeding, Burns, Dog-bites, Chest-pain, Food-poisoning, head injury, Snakebite, Stroke, Fractures and some common illnesses, and also provides precautions ,including their symptoms , causes and treatments and diet to be followed…

title: High School Doctor ER Emergency Hospital Game
description:
High School Doctor ER Emergency Hospital Game is a unique mix of high school simulator & hospital simulation, in which you do Emergency treatment in High School games. In this Doctor Hospital games you will treat student girl & school boy who get injured on first day in the school. You are an experienced ER Emergency Doctor in city hospital Simulation working in hospital Emergency Room. 
In High School Doctor ER Emergency Hospital Game, school boys keep coming in to clinic of ER Doctor Hospital after playing sports. You’re the only emergency doctor who can provide first aid to school kids in Doctor Games. ER Doctor sterilize your doctor tools, fix ER doctor chair & prepare emergency room to give first aid and medical care in best Doctor Games.

title: Asthma Aust – Asthma First Aid
description:
Welcome to ASTHMA first aid.

Covering both first aid use in the event of an asthma emergency plus the ability to review all the steps, ASTHMA first aid is your go-to tool for an asthma emergency.

This app is an educational tool developed by Asthma Australia for people with asthma, their families and carers. It provides easy access to the national community asthma first aid steps in both live and training versions.

Suitable for use in various community settings including family, friends, school, childcare, sport and recreation, this app allows you to:
• follow the community asthma first aid process live in ATTACK mode
• learn the community asthma first aid process in TRAINING REVIEW mode
• review the community asthma first aid process, using a sample of scenarios, in TRAINING SCENARIO mode

About Asthma Australia
For over 50 years Asthma Australia and Asthma Foundations have been the leaders in asthma health care, research and support. Asthma Australia delivers evidence-based preventative health strategies to over 200,000 people every year and provides support, training and resources to the primary health care sector. They fund vital basic science and population health research contributing to national and international understandings of asthma and how best to manage the disease.

title: Primeros Auxilios - Cruz Roja Mexicana
description:
Sencillo. Gratis. Puede salvar vidas. La aplicación oficial de primeros auxilios de la IFRC te brinda acceso instantáneo a la información que necesitas saber para manejar las emergencias de primeros auxilios más comunes. Con vídeos, cuestionarios interactivos y consejos paso a paso, nunca ha sido tan fácil saber primeros auxilios.

En la actualidad trabaja con las siguientes regiones o sociedades nacionales de la Cruz Roja y la Media Luna Roja: Albania, Afganistán, Argentina, Bahrain, Bélgica (Flandes), Bélgica (Valona), Belice, Bolivia, Brasil, Brunei, el Caribe, Chile, Colombia, Costa Rica, Dinamarca, Ecuador, Egipto, El Salvador, Etiopía, Georgia, Grecia, Haití, Honduras, Hong Kong, Indonesia, Irán, Iraq, Irlanda, Italia, Jordania, Kazajastán, Kenia, Corea, Kirguistán, Líbano, Macao, Macedonia, Malasia, Malta, Marruecos, Myanmar, Nepal, islas del Pacífico, Palestina, Panamá, Perú, Filipinas, Portugal, Rusia, Ruanda, Singapur, Sudáfrica, Sri Lanka, Sudán, Siria, Túnez, Uganda, Ucrania, Venezuela, oeste de África, Zimbabue.
706
"■ Instrucciones sencillas paso a paso, te guiarán en escenarios cotidianos de primeros auxilios. 
■ Totalmente integrada con los números de emergencia (como 911, 999 o 112) por lo que puedes llamar para  pedir ayuda desde la aplicación en cualquier momento, incluso mientras viajas a través de fronteras. 
■ Los vídeos y las animaciones hacen que aprender primeros auxilios sea fácil y divertido.
■ Consejos de seguridad para todo, desde condiciones climáticas adversas en invierno hasta huracanes, terremotos y tornados, que ayudan a prepararse para las emergencias.
■ Contenido precargado que brinda acceso instantáneo a toda la información de seguridad en cualquier momento, incluso sin conexión celular o wi-fi.
■ Cuestionarios interactivos que permiten ganar medallas que puedes compartir con tus amigos junto con el conocimiento para salvar vidas."

En la actualidad trabaja con las siguientes regiones o sociedades nacionales de la Cruz Roja y la Media Luna Roja: Albania, Afganistán, Argentina, Bahrain, Bélgica (Flandes), Bélgica (Valona), Belice, Bolivia, Brasil, Brunei, el Caribe, Chile, Colombia, Costa Rica, Dinamarca, Ecuador, Egipto, El Salvador, Etiopía, Georgia, Grecia, Haití, Honduras, Hong Kong, Indonesia, Irán, Iraq, Irlanda, Italia, Jordania, Kazajastán, Kenia, Corea, Kirguistán, Líbano, Macao, Macedonia, Malasia, Malta, Marruecos, Myanmar, Nepal, islas del Pacífico, Palestina, Panamá, Perú, Filipinas, Portugal, Rusia, Ruanda, Singapur, Sudáfrica, Sri Lanka, Sudán, Siria, Túnez, Uganda, Ucrania, Venezuela, oeste de África, Zimbabue.
706
"■ Instrucciones sencillas paso a paso, te guiarán en escenarios cotidianos de primeros auxilios.
■ Totalmente integrada con los números de emergencia (como 911, 999 o 112) por lo que puedes llamar para pedir ayuda desde la aplicación en cualquier momento, incluso mientras viajas a través de fronteras.
■ Los vídeos y las animaciones hacen que aprender primeros auxilios sea fácil y divertido.
■ Consejos de seguridad para todo, desde condiciones climáticas adversas en invierno hasta huracanes, terremotos y tornados, que ayudan a prepararse para las emergencias.
■ Contenido precargado que brinda acceso instantáneo a toda la información de seguridad en cualquier momento, incluso sin conexión celular o wi-fi.
■ Cuestionarios interactivos que permiten ganar medallas que puedes compartir con tus amigos junto con el conocimiento para salvar vidas."

title: First aid
description:
Experts of the Institute of Industrial Design recognized First Aid app as very well designed. On top of that the app was among the finalists of the competition for best designed products available in the Polish market in competition Good Design 2016. 
The Good Design Competition is a nationwide design competition held annually from 1993 by the Institute of Industrial Design. The Competition awards products of different purpose, which are innovative, well-designed and matching consumers’ needs.

Statistics are alarming: People are incapable and scared of giving pre-medical first aid. Under stress and pressure, lacking basic knowledge and experience, it’s quite hard for us to attempt any resuscitation treatments. Willing to challenge this, in fact really serious problem we created a mobile application, which leading thought was to cause right reactions in people facing an emergency.

We designed simple and easy-to-comprehend illustrated instructions, in order to shorten the time an average app user needs to understand a method of interaction with a victim . Additional advantage of our solution is a lector, reading instructions out loud, to improve performing first aid on a victim. Suggestions depend on the victim’s age – before attempting to help, a user chooses weather help is being given to an adult, a child, or a new-born. The software is free and can be accesses and fully operational off-line. Moreover, its design makes navigating through it really seamless and intuitional.

First Aid is a must-have at all time app. It allows quick, effective and safe advice on how to act in unpredictable situations, threatening someone’s health or life.

Functions:

Instructions about methods of providing first aid to a new-born, child or an adult.
Allows for an effective spare-of-a-moment decision making and acting, thanks to its lector feature.
Presents a workflow with its vivid illustrations.
Localizes nearest hospitals on a map and shows directions to a chosen facility.
Allows for a quick call for help, with its alarm-call feature.
Optimizes smartphone settings, by setting maximum screen brightness, locking the screensaver and forcing maximum volume for better app-user interaction.

title: First Aid Guide
description:
First Aid for Emergency

Any emergency can be handled easily with adequate preparation, including a medical one.

First aid is essential in emergency cases. Knowing what action needs to be taken to control an emergency can make the difference between life and death.

Emergencies occur all around us, in all spheres of life. When you are caught in emergency situation ,'first aid' is your first choice.

Download First Aid  and you never know when this information might come handy!
