title: Learn First Aid.
description:
Free application about everything you need to know in first aid.
First aid can save lives.
First aid consists of immediate care given to a sick, injured, or injured person. Knowing what not to do is as important as knowing what to do.
Download this app for free and you will always have it on hand if necessary, to prevent and know how to act in each case.
This free app contains tutorial videos that explain everything to you clearly and step by step without any difficulty.
In this app you will find:
🚑 First aid guide.
🚑 First aid classes.
🚑 10 first aid tricks we all do wrong.
🚑 First aid, cardiopulmonary resuscitation.
🚑 In traffic accidents, what to do and what not to do.
🚑 Bleeding.
🚑 Learn first aid for pets ...
Many more courses and tips that will help you know how to act on each occasion.
With this free app you will increase your knowledge regarding first aid, in an emergency situation you will know how to act, and you will still have security of what you should do.
With the videos contained in this app, it acts as a toilet while the doctor arrives.
It is very important to have first aid knowledge, we should all have it, we can get to save lives with these free videos.
These videos will be renewed periodically so you can learn new things
Download this free application, essential that we should all have on hand.
It can be of great help to you !!!

title: First Aid for the USMLE Step 3, Fifth Edition
description:
The resident's trusted, one-stop guide to acing the USMLE Step 3. Co-written by residents who recently took the exam and know what it takes to pass

STRONG FOCUS ON TEST-RELEVANT MATERIAL MAXIMIZES YOUR STUDY TIME!

First Aid for the USMLE Step 3, Fifth Edition provides busy residents with thousands of high-yield facts, mnemonics, and full-color visual aids to help them pass the last of the required USMLE examinations. Also included are the reader-acclaimed "mini-cases" designed to help residents pass the case portion of the examination.  First Aid for the USMLE Step 3, Fifth Edition is carefully written to focus on high-yield, top-priority information, most likely to be included on the exam.

FEATURES:
• The resident's trusted, one-stop guide to acing the Step 3 written by residents and reviewed by faculty for accuracy
• Packed with proven test-taking strategies based on the 2-day exam
• Concise, high-yield format highlights board-relevant information
• 100 cases prepare you for the case portion of the exam
• Renewed emphasis on integrated pathophysiology, plus diagnosis and management "next steps"
• More study-enhancing, vignette-style "flash cards" and full-color clinical images
• Resident-tested tips and shortcuts for the CCS

This app is very intuitive and easy to navigate, allowing you to browse the contents or search for topics. The powerful search tool gives you word suggestions that appear in the text as you type, so it is lightning fast and helps with spelling those long medical terms. The search tool also keeps a recent history of past search terms so you can go back to a previous search result very easily. You have the ability to create notes and bookmarks separately for text, images and tables to enhance your learning. You can also change the text size for easier reading. There is also an interactive cases section to simulate patient encounters step-by-step.

After the app has been downloaded, no internet connection is needed to retrieve the content of the app. All of the text and images are available to you on your device anytime, anywhere, and lightning fast. This app is also automatically optimized for whatever size device you are currently using, either phone or tablet. 

This interactive app is based on the full content of First Aid for the USMLE Step 3, Fifth Edition by McGraw-Hill Education.
ISBN-13: 978-1260440317
ISBN-10: 1260440311

Authors:
Tao Le, MD, MHS
Kachiu Cecilia Lee, MD, MPH
Marina Boushra, MD


Disclaimer: This app is intended for the education of healthcare professionals and not as a diagnostic and treatment reference for the general population. 


Developed by Usatine Media 
Richard P. Usatine, MD, Co-President, Professor of Family & Community Medicine, Professor of Dermatology and Cutaneous Surgery, University of Texas Health San Antonio 
Peter Erickson, Co-President, Lead Software Developer

title: Basic Life Support
description:
According to the World Health Organization, cardiovascular diseases are the most common cause of death worldwide and account for about one-third of deaths.

 As our population ages, the prevalence of these diseases is expected to increase. This program will help prepare participants to handle these events and other life-threatening incidents.

The Basic Life Support (BLS): CPR and First Aid provider program is designed to provide course participants with foundational knowledge and teach skills needed to perform cardiopulmonary resuscitation (CPR) and other lifesaving skills.

During this course, participants will become familiar with the signs and symptoms associated with cardiovascular diseases such as heart attack as well as with other diseases and conditions that may also pose an immediate threat to life. Those conditions — such as shock, choking and external bleeding — are included in this course.

The first-aid component of this course addresses additional circumstances and diseases that may require intervention and assistance from emergency medical services (EMS).

Successful completion of the BLS: CPR and First Aid course includes demonstration of skill competency and passing a knowledge assessment. Upon completion, you will receive a provider card indicating that you have been trained in basic life support (including CPR) and first-aid measures.

Reading this handbook without instruction and skill practice will not make someone competent to provide CPR or first-aid assistance. 

Leave your comments, questions or suggestions, we are looking forward to hear from you.

During this course, participants will become familiar with the signs and symptoms associated with cardiovascular diseases such as heart attack as well as with other diseases and conditions that may also pose an immediate threat to life. Those conditions — such as shock, choking and external bleeding — are included in this course.

The first-aid component of this course addresses additional circumstances and diseases that may require intervention and assistance from emergency medical services (EMS).

Successful completion of the BLS: CPR and First Aid course includes demonstration of skill competency and passing a knowledge assessment. Upon completion, you will receive a provider card indicating that you have been trained in basic life support (including CPR) and first-aid measures.

Reading this handbook without instruction and skill practice will not make someone competent to provide CPR or first-aid assistance.

Leave your comments, questions or suggestions, we are looking forward to hear from you.
summary: Basic CPR and first aid skills
comments: I found this app extremely helpful. It is easy to use, however the addition of more schematic diaphragms will make it more fruitful.
Best app for learning, I am BCLS trainer. I recommend this app.
Your work is exceptional. How I wish every health care professional would download your app and simply learn and save someone's life SEM
Im a trained responder and this app is very useful
Very good for nursing exams and staff Nurses

title: Staying Alive
description:
Staying Alive provides defibrillator mapping and citizen responders management. The App is available in 18 languages and maps over 120.000 defibrillators worldwide.

Staying Alive is an award winning free App designed and developed by AEDMAP.

Main features include:

- AED location : locate the 10 closest AEDs near you or in a specific address, through the use of a live database that is updated each time you launch the application.

- Reporting of new AED.
You can post new defibrillators and now even edit existing ones.

- Citizen Responders network: If you are trained to CPR you can register through the App as a Citizen Responder. You can then be notified by the EMS in case of cardiac arrest near you to provide CPR. Staying Alive First Responder technology works in France, Belgium and Switzerland so far.

- The reminding of CPR gesture with video illustration of the survival chain "Call, Start CPR, Shock and wait for help"

- A practical guide on the use of Automatic External Defibrillator (AED).

- An "Emergency" mode that will help you to make the right things in the right order. The new emergency mode detects automatically the local number depending on you location.

---
 
The location and the list of defibrillators supplied by this application are given as an indication. Please note that this application is interactive and that the data provided by users will not be checked by a dedicated organization. AEDMAP is not liable for any errors in the locations of defibrillators.

Developed by AEDMAP - www.aedmap.org

comments: My nearest AED, been there for years, isn't shown. No confidence in the app.
Likewise, way out of date and can't add locations of defibs. Waste of time

I am tasked with entering over 100 AEDs in my area. However, despite saying "This AED has been added", it fails to show. Stranger still is that some of these will appear at a later date on the map only to disappear again. I asked my wife to check on her phone supposing that this might be a problem with my mobile, but she too couldn't see those I've added.   Living in a tourist area I am anxious to get this done while the season's here, but I'm frustrated by this problem.   I have raised a support ticket but this hasn't been answered yet.   Not very impressed.

Seems to be the only aed locator which has a complete database of my local defibs (i have tried 3 others). It would be much better if the app size was smaller. 60mb is a lot when you only have 8gb storage.:\ great idea though. Everyone should be able to find one in energencies.

Great app, but outdated information in my area. When I try to add new defibs I get an error ("An error occurred, check the fields") despite checking the fields multiple times. I'd love to enhance the app by adding defibs in my area - I'm in UK on a Oneplus 5T

title: First Aid In Telugu
description:
This app provides you with step by step instructions for dealing with a wide range of situations. 

First Aid is the process of giving a patient emergency care when injured or ill. This initial care given to the victim is essential, before medically trained personnel arrive, or before the victim arrives at a health care center. 

This app contains a list of all the health issues that we face in our daily life. It provides both signs and symptoms of various attacks that people face on their daily basis. 

With the help of this app you will come to know what to do in an emergency, and how to administer first aid for a critically ill or injured human being. The information is all hosted on the app itself, meaning no internet connection is needed, making it fast and easy to access. best of all, it’s free.

This app includes the latest first aid advice and protocols for dealing with emergency situations. It is simple to follow with illustrated guides and instructions.

title: Basic Life Support BLS, CPR & First Aid Exam Guide
description:
Get the world best learning app ever developed with all the features that you need and more than you imagine.
This app is a combination of sets, containing practice questions, MCQs, terms & concepts for self learning & exam preparation on the topic of Basic Life Support BLS, CPR & First Aid.

It contains at least 40 study notes quiz sets & 2900 Flashcards.
It covers the following subject areas:

1- Respiration & Circulation
2- Scene Safety Assessment
3- Initial Assessment
4- Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation CPR 
5- CPR & AED Use
6- Foreign Body Airway Obstruction FBAO
7- Shock Management 
8- First Aid Assessment 
9- Control of External Bleeding
10- Bandaging & Wound Management 
11- Medical Emergencies
12- Burns
13- Temperature-related Injuries
14- Lifting & Moving
15- Glossary "A" TO "Z"

Main Features:

-        Works perfectly Offline, you can learn on the Go, Anytime & Everywhere.
-        Six study Modes (learning mode, handout mode, test mode with MCQs, slideshow mode, random mode & Game Memory mode)
 -        Text to Speech (Listen to the flashcards while you are ridding, jogging or driving).
-        Sort your flashcards by topic.
-        Search flashcards by key words.
-       Select your favorite flashcards & Flag for review the most difficult.
-       Add  & save your own flashcards.
-       Edit & replace existing flashcards.
-       Add your comment to any flashcard keep seeing them with.
-       Get back to your last study session, exactly to the last flashcard studied including the study mode.
-       Full dashboard to monitor your progress.
-       In-depth statistics of your performance that shows your strongest & weakest areas.
-       Share your best study notes.
-       Exam taking tips & tricks which offers you an efficient & quick way to more effectively prepare for & take multiple-choice tests.
 
You will be amazed by the number of facilities that we added to this App. 

Invest in your Success Now. Your investment in knowledge, professionalism & expertise is the real & best capital & assets that you own.

This application is not dedicated for a specific professional certification, it's just a tool to assist students & professionals to expand their knowledge & in-depth their expertise.

title: ULFS2 - First Aid Kit
description:
Stay in touch with the Lebanese University Faculty Of Science - II with this mobile application organized by its Students Committee in order to facilitate your university lifestyle .
Using this app , you’re capable to calculate , by entering your grades :

• Your Partials GPA
• Your Finals GPA

This app can help you with your calculations, for instance, when you enter your partials results in order to calculate your GPA , it directly gives you the minimum you should get in the finals to pass the semester.

And for students who are planning to present the med school entrance exam, we got your back !! This app gives you directly the minimum you need to get to be able to present the entrance exam.
And while you're at it, stay tuned for new features coming out every now and then.

EMERGENCY HQ is a rescue simulation game. Take control of emergency units, including fire and ambulance, police, SWAT and technical services. Head up operations of rescues, crimes, medical and catastrophe management, dispatch and command vehicles and personnel.
Control firefighters, EMTs, paramedics, doctors, police officers and special forces to fight fires, rescue animals, save lives, fight terrorists and much more. Build up your base and put together the perfect emergency services team! Upgrade your fire trucks, hospital, other buildings and units, expand your headquarters. comments: I've played this game before, and I love it. But now that I've reinstalled it, it isn't loading. I'm going to give it 4 stars once this bug is fixed, but until then it's going to be 2 stars. I love this game, but please fix all the bugs.

The main qualm i have with this game is how expensive all of the buildings are. I played this game for the longest time and stopped. Now I remember why. Buildings are way too expensive and im having to use gems to skip missions that I cant do becuase I dont have the right units. It's either a time consuming grind or spending real money.

Been playing for a few days and i am really enjoying this game, it seems to be more than fair so its not forcing me into making payments i dont want to make ect, there NO forced ads which is amazing too say. The gameplay is smooth and fun. The missions are repeated sometimes but hey, more money, xp and the 3rd time round its all 3x. Its nice to see a committed and fair developer. Thank You 👌👍💙

There is no new exciting things and the game is become boring for me. Earning of coins is low and vehicle call cost is high and upgrade charges are too high. Connecting issue even i am connected to a high speed wifi. Every day 3 to 4 missions i have to skip by using 5 emerald because my base is not enough to complete those missions then why it is showing to me. Earning of emerald is too low per day according to its experience. No new events.

I actually like this game but, from 4 star, I made it 2 star. Since you didnt do anything abt this "CONNECTION ERROR" problem sht. In this game, "BUILDINGS ARE EXPENSIVE". So everytime that connection problem appear, I lost the money i spent for the units. FIX IT THIS TIME. PLEASE... I think every player has the same problem. Atleast return the money back.

title: Redicare First Aid Kit Restock
description:
For 26 years, Redicare has provided first aid consumables to workplaces and schools across the New York City Metropolitan area.  Now we’re making it easier for you to experience our A+ service while managing your own kit, no matter where you are by providing you with the mobility to visit each of your cabinets and add required items to your cart.

 

Compliance with confidence

In a workplace, your most important asset is your employees. Along with that, safety of your stakeholders (be it students, clients, vendors, visitors) is paramount.  Keeping up with their needs can be daunting and sometimes difficult.  Don’t let yourself become overwhelmed by ever changing OSHA/ANSI first aid requirements, and rely on Redicare to let you know when to check your kit for shortages or expired items. 

 

Mobile convenience, Fixed reliability 

This is the first mobile app geared towards helping you restock your first aid cabinets, saving you time, money and aggravation. (you’re welcome!) Using your smartphone or tablet, you can move with ease from location to location while generating a shopping cart. 

 

Getting low on something? Order again with barcode assurance

Knuckle? Fingertip? Plastic? Elastic? Detectable? Even choosing the right bandage can be tricky.  Using your device’s camera, the RedicareDirect app scans Redicare product barcodes and offers you the item to add to your cart.  Go ahead, scan away!

 

Here or there, be on the same page.

Just remember to log in!  Your shopping cart will be securely synced to your user name!  Once you have what you need, simply check out using your mobile device, or you can even head back to your desktop, login and checkout using your computer with PayPal, Amazon Pay or your corporate card of choice! 

 

REQUIREMENTS

    OS version KitKat (4.4.X) or above
    1gb of RAM or more

To check out you will need to sign in with a FREE RedicareDirect account.  Register on your app, or online https://www.redicaredirect.com/register.  

By installing the app, you agree to these terms and conditions: https://redicaredirect.com/conditions-of-use

title: Ambulance Doctor Hospital - Rescue Game
description:
Drive your ambulance doctor car & cure the injured persons. Pack & review your tools of emergency ambulance vehicles and go fast for saving the lives of innocents. Take injured people to the hospital and examine the patients carefully for better treatment. Patients are in pain, providing them excellent treatment for better recovery in doctor games. 

Rescue the innocents, drive fast & give them treatment on your ambulance car. If there is any serious accident, take them to the hospital for a better remedy. Your ambulance vehicle is always ready to drive, you have to take care of needy & innocent peoples who are in need of treatment. 

You are in love with your ambulance vehicle in a doctor game for children, be a professional fantastic doctor, and take care of all in your city. Emergency medicine profession for first aid of patients & perform your traumatologist job perfectly. Drive your doctor ambulance vehicle carefully.

And when the urgent operation is needed, perform the job of a doctor & traumatologist in the dr game. Operate the required patients carefully and show your skills in the ambulance doctor game. Along with this, wash your ambulance vehicle in a salon. Enjoy ambulance wash & ambulance assembly in the game of doctor ambulance car with amazing tools. title: First Aid Spinal Cord Injury - Wings for Life
description: This app by the Wings for Life Foundation includes the latest first aid advice for patients with suspected spinal cord injury (SCI) and provides detailed insights into the scientific context on how to take care of patients at the site of injury. It aims to optimize the protection of spinal cord tissue with formidable options for preemptive care. The app includes learning material and up to date references including push notification with the newest scientific research results. If there are any further questions an expert of the Wings for Life Foundation can be contacted through the app. Furthermore, for medical doctors involved in primary care at the site of injury, there is a patient checklist available.

title: যেখানে ডাক্তার নেই - প্রাথমিক চিকিৎসা First Aid BN
description:
ডাক্তার না থাকলে করণীয় - এটি এই অ্যাপের মুল বিষয়বস্তু।   Prathomik Chikitsha প্রাথমিক চিকিৎসার বই একটি জরুরী মুহূর্তে ব্যবহারের জন্য স্বাস্থ্য অ্যাপ বিশেষ করে যেখানে চিকিৎসক নেই বা চিকিৎসার ব্যবস্থা করা সম্ভব না। First aid bangla is an emergency app when doctor is not available or too far from you.

আমাদের সবারই প্রাথমিক চিকিৎসার প্রয়োজনীয়তা সম্পর্কে জ্ঞান থাকা আবশ্যক। Primary treatment বা প্রাথমিক চিকিৎসা প্রশিক্ষন নিয়ে রাখতে পারলে বিপদের সময় খুব কাজে দিবে। আমরা এই অ্যাপে যে বিষয়গুলো First Aid হিসেবে চিহ্নিত করেছিঃ

🏥 জ্বর হলে করণীয়
🏥 অজ্ঞান হয়ে গেলে করনীয়
🏥 জিহ্বা পুড়ে গেলে করণীয়

descriptionHTML:
ডাক্তার না থাকলে করণীয় - এটি এই অ্যাপের মুল বিষয়বস্তু। Prathomik Chikitsha প্রাথমিক চিকিৎসার বই একটি জরুরী মুহূর্তে ব্যবহারের জন্য স্বাস্থ্য অ্যাপ বিশেষ করে যেখানে চিকিৎসক নেই বা চিকিৎসার ব্যবস্থা করা সম্ভব না। First aid bangla is an emergency app when doctor is not available or too far from you.

title: Sanjeevani- The First Aid App
description:
An Advanced First Aid App packed with procedures, latest guidelines and management of various medical Emergency. Which will help every one in day to day life.

App Highlights
- Smooth Material Design
- Detailed view (Introduction, Symptoms, First Aid, DOs and DO NOTs)
- Plain Language with minimal use of Medical terms
- Auto reading of paragraphs on click
- Graphical Representation
- Quick links to related topic
- Quick Reference for hard words
- Clearly mentioned Notes
- Step by step explained Procedures
- Misc features like BMI Calculator, Age Calculator etc

Topic Explained

Emergency:
- CPR
- Chest Pain
- Head Injury
- Poisoning
- Fracture
- Drowning
- Seizure
- Stroke
- Burns
- Bleeding
- Asthma
- Snake Bite
- Electric Shock
- Chocking
- Shock

- Cold
- Heat
- Sprain
- Insect Bite
- Allergic Reaction

- Recovery Position
- Hand Wash
- How to use an AED

Misc:

- Age Calculator
- Vaccination Schedule
- Anti Rabies(Dog Bite) Injection Date Reminder

title: First Aid for Basic Sciences General Principles 3E
description:
Comprehensive, single-source coverage of the entire first year of medical school!

First Aid for the Basic Sciences: General Principles, Third Edition provides readers with a solid understanding of the basic science principles with which all medical students must be familiar. Delivering a comprehensive single-source review of the entire first year of medical school, the book assumes little prior knowledge, and is written in a non-technical, easy-to-understand style.

Features:
• An essential companion during your first two years of medical school
• Includes important foundational content most other reviews leave out
• Focuses on the high-yield topics and facts tested on the USMLE Step 1
• Enhanced by full-color images, learning aids, tables, and concise text to streamline your study and help you excel in coursework and on the USMLE Step 1
• Provides a complete framework for understanding biochemistry, microbiology, immunology, pathology, pharmacology, and public health sciences
• Mirrors the table of contents of First Aid for the USMLE Step 1 to facilitate side-by-side study
• Written by students who aced the USMLE and reviewed by top faculty

The content in the app is formatted for optimal viewing on your mobile device to make these great review resources more accessible than ever.  No internet connection needed to view the full app. Once you have purchased the app, the full content is downloaded onto your device for super quick image and information retrieval. 

This app is easy to navigate, allowing you to browse the contents or search the text. The powerful search engine allows you to find what you are looking for instantly. The search tool also shows you suggestions as you type so it is quick and helps with spelling medical terms. You can create bookmarks and notes, allowing you to learn and memorize the material with great speed and efficiency. You can also change the text size for easier reading.


This interactive app is based on the full content of First Aid For The Basic Sciences: General Principles, Third Edition by McGraw-Hill Education.

SENIOR EDITORS:
Tao Le, MD, MHS
William L. Hwang, MD, PhD

EDITORS:
Luke R.G. Pike, MD, DPhil
M. Scott Moore, DO


Disclaimer: This app is intended for the education of healthcare professionals and not as a diagnostic and treatment reference for the general population. 


Developed by Usatine Media, LLC 
Richard P. Usatine, MD, Co-President, Professor of Family & Community Medicine, Professor of Dermatology and Cutaneous Surgery, University of Texas Health Science Center San Antonio 
Peter Erickson, Co-President, Lead Software Developer

title: WISER for Android
description:
WISER (Wireless Information System for Emergency Responders) is a mobile application designed to assist first responders in hazardous material incidents.

First responders in general, and HAZMAT units in particular, must make many decisions quickly in handling hazardous-materials incidents. They need accurate information about the hazardous substances, the emergency resources available, and the surrounding environmental conditions to save lives and minimize the impact on the environment and physical property. The WISER application extracts content from TOXNET's Hazardous Substances Data Bank (HSDB), an authoritative, peer-reviewed information resource maintained by the National Library of Medicine, and places that information into the hands of those who need it most.

Features of WISER

* Rapid access to the most important information about a hazardous substance by an intelligent synopsis engine and display called “Key Info”

* Intuitive, simple, logical user interface developed by working with experienced first responders

* Comprehensive decision support, including assistance in identification of an unknown chemical or chemical syndrome and guidance on the immediate actions necessary to save lives and protect the environment

* GIS support provides for isolation/protective distance overlays on a map of the incident

* Access to NLM’s Hazardous Substances Data Bank (HSDB), which contains detailed peer-reviewed information on hazardous substances

* Interactive chemical reactivity data based on NOAA's CRW 3.0, allowing WISER to predict hazards caused by a user prescribed mix of chemicals.

* User Profiles enable users to specify the role they are currently playing at the scene of an incident: first responder, HAZMAT specialist, EMS specialist, hospital provider, or preparedness planner. The key information presented to the user about a substance varies depending on this role, so that the information most relevant to the respective job can be quickly accessed.

* Radiological and biological substance support.

* ERG 2012 data; the Android version of WISER includes the full ERG 2012 tool.

* Mobile support, providing first responders critical information where they need it, when they need it.

comments: Crashed when I tapped "Search Known Substances." Not cool! I will change the rating if it gets fixed.

I used to use this app, and really liked the information it provided, but now the search known substances does not open, and immediately closes the app. Not much use anymore. Please repair the problem.
As a full-time HM Tech I found the updated knowledge base to be very helpful. Now as a retired firefighter/HM Tech I teach HM classes and display this app for new HM Techs.
Great for drivers and responders both. Just wish they would add drivers as an option for why you download the app.
Reinstalling because app crashes now after years of use.

description:
😍 If you do not know how to do the basic exercises of first aid, we offer you in our application the basic practices to be able to help a person who is in trouble with cardiopulmonary resuscitation
😇 Or when someone is having a heart attack we have videos to do CPR, here we show you videos and basic tips to offer safe and reliable first aid
🤕 The ideal would be to have a first aid kit, although with some basic teachings that you can find in our aid videos you can have a guide on your mobile that will help you save the life of any person.
🤒 To learn first aid you just need to have a little will and download our free application that is available on google play.
😷 We have videos where we can cure burns, heart attacks, suffocation, drowning, and flictosis, when we cannot find the entry point of the procedure.
➕ Helping a person is done with simple tips and very effective and direct video tutorials to help a family member, friend or even a stranger to us, the important thing is to make their life suffer as little as possible.

🆘 What are you waiting for to download our first aid application for the whole family and if you follow these simple tips we can save the life of anyone who is in a health emergency situation
🤧 The first minutes that we can offer to a sick person are essential and can be used so that the person we are caring for can have the minimum of serious injuries or consequences.
One of the most important tips is that the first thing we always have to do is call the emergency services and report everything that is relevant and strange to us, as well as expand the maximum information so that when the ambulance arrives they know how to act accordingly. the fastest way possible.
To save the life of a person who needs an emergency, we have to call the red cross and do the basic exercises for the attack he is having.
We offer you all kinds of advice in our free video tutorials to save a person from a heart attack, a serious burn, if she is drowning with the heimlich maneuver we can save her life.
These emergencies are continuous where anyone can happen to you and we will be able to help our fellow man until the emergency health services arrive.
The heimlich maneuver is the most unknown and it can also be treated in babies but it is very important to do it correctly.

 Each situation requires a fast, safe and effective action but in our application to save lives we leave you some important steps of what we must always do, we must never lose our calm and we have to try to help others with basic first aid before they arrive. health services.

title: Emergency Treatment Guide
description:
Accidents happens anywhere around us. Emergency Treatment Guide App puts expert advice for everyday emergencies in your hand that you can refer anytime. Get the app and be prepared for what life brings. With simple step-by-step advice it’s never been easier to know first aid.

Emergency Treatment Guide app contains first aid guide for:-
- how to do CPR
- choking
- emergency bleeding control
- other injuries and seizures
- animal bites, insect bites
- poisonous plant
- frostbite

A pocket guide for 1st aid
This ebook covers in depth all topics required for a standard first aid course, and also includes a section on advanced topics. The basics covered include:
➲ Primary assessment and CPR
➲ Legal aspects of first aid, including negligence and consent
➲ Circulatory emergencies, such as bleeding, heart attack and stroke
➲ Respiratory emergencies, such as asthma and anaphylactic shock
➲ Internal injuries, such as broken bones, chest injuries, and internal bleeding
➲ Burns, seizures and other medical conditions

Download Emergency Treatment Guide for Free and saves lives!

App provides speech recognition function so users can work with the app
independently and can keep a history of their practice.

comments: The app is easy to use and the call simulation was very realistic. Excellent voice recognition feature which translated perfect voice to text in the practice log. I feel very confident that my children would know exactly what to say in a real life situation if there was ever the need to call emergency services.

title: ERG 2020 for Android
description:
PHMSA (U.S. Department of Transportation Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration)'s 2020 Emergency Response Guidebook provides first responders with a go-to resource to help deal with hazmat accidents during the critical first 30 minutes.

The ERG contains an indexed list of dangerous goods and the associated ID number, the general hazards they pose and recommended safety precautions. For example, if emergency responders arrive at the scene of an overturned tractor trailer displaying a DOT hazmat placard, they would use the guide to identify the material associated with the placard and get guidance on how to respond accordingly. 

The 2020 version of the ERG includes general revisions, reorganized general information pages, and the addition of protective distance mapping.  Updated every four years, the ERG is available free to public safety agencies in all states and territories through designated state coordinators’ offices.  PHMSA has partnered with the National Library of Medicine to provide this free application as well as a version of the ERG in its Wireless Information System for Emergency Responders (WISER) application.

summary: ERG 2020 (Emergency Response Guidebook 2020)
developer: National Library of Medicine at NIH
recentChanges:
This release includes the full Emergency Response Guidebook 2020!

Sharing and collaboration is now available. Share data and protective distance maps with other mobile (iOS or Android) users.

Search functionality has been improved to make it more accurate and flexible.

Issues with share URL encoding and the proper recovery of ERG 2016 history have been resolved.
comments: Got the 2020 update and the app crashes when I search by name or UN. Crash has been fixed by uninstalling and reinstalling. Useful app to have. Convenient for quick HAZMAT reference.
Very helpful. Every emergency response personal must install this

App works really well, faster then the book, and I like that it saves recent searches for when you need to quickly switch between a few things. The evacuation map is GREAT. On the down side I noticed the P for polymerization is missing on some chemicals, IE 119, this is a pretty big issue, and one I hope the developers look into quickly.
Just needs an option to pick a location from the map. Instead of being forced to use current location or have to know the address or coordinates.
As a First Responder I think it's great! Use it all the time. It be great if you can click name or UN instead of searching from product to guide. When is the update coming out?

title: First Aid for the USMLE Step 2 CS, Sixth Edition
description:
The #1 review for the USMLE Step 2 CS is now even better!

The Sixth Edition of First Aid for the USMLE Step 2 CS has been updated to reflect the latest NBME exam format and worksheet items, and incorporates feedback from recent US and international test-takers. This high-yield review delivers a thorough exam preparation guide for the USMLE Step 2 CS, offering a solid review of frequently test CS cases, along with proven study and exam strategies for clinical encounters.

Features:
• 44 full-length practice cases that simulate the real exam, updated to reflect recent exam changes, and test your ability to document the patient’s most likely diagnosis and how it is  supported by the history and physical findings
• A revised and expanded set of 39 minicases representing common complaints designed to help you rapidly develop a working set of differential diagnoses
• Detailed descriptions and illustrations of high-yield physical exam maneuvers that will win you points without costing time
• Updated minicases with examples of how to ask patients insightful questions
• Expanded guidelines on how to deal with challenging situations, including those that pose ethical and confidentiality issues
• An updated exam preparation guide for the new USMLE® Step 2 CS, including proven study and exam strategies for clinical encounters based on the patient-centered interview
• Updated content based on feedback from recent U.S. and international test takers


This app is very intuitive and easy to navigate, allowing you to browse the contents or search for topics. The powerful search tool gives you word suggestions that appear in the text as you type, so it is lightning fast and helps with spelling those long medical terms. The search tool also keeps a recent history of past search terms so you can go back to a previous search result very easily. You have the ability to create notes and bookmarks separately for text to enhance your learning. You can also change the text size for easier reading.

After the app has been downloaded, no internet connection is needed to retrieve the content of the app. All of the text and images are available to you on your device anytime, anywhere, and lightning fast. This app is also automatically optimized for whatever size device you are currently using, either phone or tablet. 

This interactive app contains the full content of First Aid for the USMLE Step 2 CS (Clinical Skills), Sixth Edition by McGraw-Hill Education.
ISBN-13: 978-1259862441
ISBN-10: 1259862445

Editors:
Tao Le, MD, MHS
Vikas Bhushan, MD
Kachiu C. Lee, MD, MPH
Maniver Deol, MD


Disclaimer: This app is intended for the education of healthcare professionals and not as a diagnostic and treatment reference for the general population. 


Developed by Usatine Media 
Richard P. Usatine, MD, Co-President, Professor of Family & Community Medicine, Professor of Dermatology and Cutaneous Surgery, University of Texas Health San Antonio 
Peter Erickson, Co-President, Lead Software Developer

title: Manual de Primeros Auxilios - Offline
description:
¡FUNCIONA SIN INTERNET, LLÉVALO A DONDE QUIERAS!
¡3MB QUE PUEDE SALVAR VIDAS!

El propósito de los primeros auxilios es aliviar el dolor y la ansiedad del herido o enfermo y evitar el agravamiento de su estado. En casos extremos son necesarios para evitar la muerte hasta que se consigue asistencia médica.

Los primeros auxilios varían según las necesidades de la víctima y según los conocimientos del socorrista. Saber lo que no se debe hacer es tan importante como saber qué hacer, porque una medida terapéutica mal aplicada puede producir complicaciones graves. Por ejemplo, en una apendicitis aguda un laxante suave puede poner en peligro la vida del paciente.

CONTENIDO:
- Asfixia
- Reanimación Cardio Pulmonar RCP
- Hemorragia
- Envenenamiento
- Quemaduras
- Golpe de calor y deshidratación por calor
- Lipotimia(desmayo) y coma
- Esguinces y Fracturas
- Qué hacer en terremotos y sismos
- Mordeduras
- Glosario
- Botiquín

title: Medical Terminology - Most used terms First  Aid
description:
Check out this app dedicated to understanding the language of medicine. Find the meaning of each component of a medical word.
Ideal revision for  uSMLE step 1,2,3, PANCE, Comlex,LPN, City and Guilds (AMSPAR) Certificates in Medical Terminology and CMA (AAMA) Medical Terminology Exams. Includes links to free interactive medical apps.
Suitable for premedical students, nursing students, medical secretaries, transcriptionists, and allied health students, in fact anyone with an interest in the language of medicine or medical education. If you are about to go to medical school or nursing college be one step ahead and impress your new tutors. If you are a nurse, medical secretary or allied health student learning English, studying our distance learning course will enhance your listening, writing and spelling skills. Now widely used for general practice (GP) staff training.
Medical terminology is a language for accurately describing the human body and associated components, conditions, processes and process in a science-based manner. Some examples are: trapezius, and latissimus dorsi. It is to be used in the medical and nursing fields.

We generally come across doctors or students that daily interact with in this terminology. However, we do not get to understand much as we are not familiar with these words.
Here is an android app that helps you understand this terminology in detail.

Just go ahead and download this app and get a list of commonly used medical terms along with their details explaning them further. All you need to do is search the term alphabetically to get a list of the terms and click on each term to view its respective meaning.

This app will now help you interact with your doctors and medical students with ease and confidence.

A few examples include:
1. Asthma: Respiratory disorder characterized by recurring episodes of sudden onset of breathing difficulty, wheezing on expiration and inspiration as a result of constriction of the bronchi, coughing, and thick mucous bronchial secretions; also known as reactive airway disease
2. AVPU: Acronym for Alert, Verbal, Painful, and Unresponsive; used to describe patient''s responsiveness
3. Body Substance Isolation (BSI): Isolation of substances that are excreted from the body to prevent the spread of communicable diseases

This application is brought to you totally free with the help of search monetization. I have opted to use this to be able to keep creating more free apps for you. Please note that with this app you will receive a few search points on your device, all are easily deleted or replaced. Thank you for your understanding.

This app is intended to  students, researchers, resident, doctors, biochemical specialists, dentists, nurses and medical professionals and of course Medical lecturers, teachers and professors.
Get a better score in your  USMLE  (step1, step2  CS & CK), PANCE, MCAT, DAT, COMLEX, OAT, NBDE,  or PCAT exam, and the most important  is to fall in love with the material, it worth all the attention.

title: První pomoc
description: Jednoduché. Zdarma. Může přitom zachránit život. S aplikací Českého červeného kříže První pomoc si budete umět poradit při většině příhod, ať už si zvrtnete kotník nebo půjde někomu o život. Videa, interaktivní kvízy a návody krok za krokem – první pomoc nikdy nebyla jednodušší a zabávnější. Součástí jsou i rychlé rady, pro chvíle kdy jde o každou sekundu. Volat nouzová čísla pak můžete přímo z aplikace. A nejen to – najdete tu řadu rad i pro jiné krizové situace..

summary: First aid in your pocket
recentChanges: Opravili jsme některé drobné chyby, se kterými jste se mohli setkat.
comments: Další z balíčku aplikací, které by měl mít každý.
Úžasná aplikace, která se vždy hodí.

Je dobré že taková app je a vypadá pěkně :) (...ptá se na hodnocení příliš 
brzy, sotva jsem ji otevřel) Akorát v testu jsem našel něco, co mi nesedí a 
nevím kde podat feedback, tak tady: test závažných zranění je správnou 
odpovědí dát člověka, který spadl z lešení do stabilizované polohy. Podle 
mě to není správně, protože spadl z výšky a když dýchá tak s ním nebudu 
hýbat kvůli podezření na poranění páteře (třást s ním také nebudu)
Nechcete konečně aktualizovat práva pro Android 5 a výš? Aplikace super, ale vážně vám nebudu dávat práva ke čtení mých kontaktů a polohy, když nechci.

Jsem moc rada, ze vylezla tato aplikace. Pouziti zatim bez problemu. Nemohla jsem najit prvni pomoc pri prehrati organismu (v soucasnem pocasi by se velmi hodilo) nicmene je mozne, ze jsem to prehledla.

title: Emergency Treatment Guide
description:
Any emergency can be handled easily with adequate preparation, including a medical one.
First aid is essential in emergency cases.
Knowing what action needs to be taken to control an emergency can make the difference between life and death.

Emergencies occur all around us, in all spheres of life. When you are caught in emergency situation ,'first aid' is your first choice.

Download First Aid for Emergency and you never know when this information might come handy!

Features:-

- Both in Hindi & English
- Practise Test to chek your Knowledge after reading
- Free & Offline

title: Cisali Defibrillator Firstresponder EMC worldwide
description:
CISALI EMERGENCY-APP

CISALI's (Citizens Save Lives) free and global Defibrillator Location and First Responder App serves all citizens to find defibrillator locations and first responders in an emergency situation. The integrated SOS function contains all worldwide emergency numbers.

♥ search and find a defibrillator, overview in one worldwide map
♥ provide safety and health in case of an emergency, become a hero
♥ free database for everybody
♥ add AEDs easily via the App 
♥ register as first responder 
♥ Independent, neutral, charitable data base
♥ navigation via Google Maps
♥ heart safe travelling
♥ real time synchronization

We encourage all the citizens help to locate, register and, if necessary, correct sites locations if necessary so first responders can provide a fast assistance and use a defibrillator. Our country representatives will be happy to provide assistance. CISALI is a social platform made by citizens for citizens and must be maintained by all citizens.

♥ make an emergency call
♥ alert the nearest first responder
♥ start CPR
♥ deliver electrical shock with the nearest available AED

In each of these steps you will be supported and accompanied by the Cisali App. Helping is really easy, everyone can save a life. 
Install our free and mobile rescuer that will from now on constantly accompany you and provide you with safety. 


FEEDBACKS OR QUESTIONS?
Help us to provide a better service.

Contact us at info@cisali.com or visit us on:
Facebook:           https://www.facebook.com/Citizenzssavelives/
Instagram:          https://www.instagram.com/citizens_save_lives/
Website:             https://www.citizenssavelives.com/en/

Download now for free and become a rescuer! Download the Cisali Defibrillator, First Responder and EMC App!


Disclaimer of liability:
The application of the CISALI app (Citizens Save Lives) provides a simple method for locating the nearest automated external defibrillator (AED) and finding a nearby trained first responder. CISALI does not warrant that the AED is physically located at the specified location, that the location is geographically correct, that the AED is available 24 hours a day, that the defibrillator is fully functional, that the battery is charged, that the pads have not expired, and that the first responders have undergone the required qualification measures. In no event shall CISALI or its representatives, subcontractors or members be liable for any damages whatsoever arising out of the use of the App and the information provided with the Application.

title: Oxygen Cylinder Autonomy for Diving and First Aid
description:
Must-have App for first aid staff and submarine divers.
Calculates the autonomy of the oxygen cylinder and the air cylinder.

The first aid personnel will be able to calculate the autonomy of a cylinder of oxygen through the knowledge of its capacity and oxygen supply applied to the patient.

Diving enthusiasts will finally be able to easily:
- CALCULATE THE LITERS OF YOUR TANK
- CALCULATE AIR CONSUMPTION IN A SPECIFIC DEPTH
- CALCULATE THE AUTONOMY OF YOUR TANK

There is also an All In One section where you will be guided step by step through the entire calculation of your dive, following the order you will find out how many minutes of diving you will have.

title: First Aid Ghar Baithe
description:
First aid is basic knowledge about how to help people who are suddenly sick (illnesses) or hurt (injuries or body damage). 
For example, first aid is used at accidents to help an injured person until he receives medical treatment (help by doctors, nurses or ambulances).

title: Kindernotfall-App
description:
Die Kindernotfall-App bietet Ihnen Erste-Hilfe-Maßnahmen, Arztsuche und Checklisten an.

Je größer der Radius, den sich Kinder erschließen, desto größer auch der Gefahrenraum. Einen Teil der Sorge nimmt jetzt die Kindernotfall-App. Sie gibt Checklisten und Tipps für mehr Sicherheit und bietet Hilfe im Notfall. Die bei leichten Verletzungen, einer plötzlichen Erkrankung oder einer lebensbedrohlichen Situation angemessen reagiert. Außerdem verfügt sie über eine Suche nach Kinder- und Jugendarztpraxen, Notfallambulanzen und Apotheken in Deutschland. Für den Ernstfall gibt es eine direkte und schnell anwählbare Notruffunktion.

Die Kindernotfall-App bietet folgende Inhalte und Funktionen:

- Informationen und Maßnahmen zur Ersten Hilfe
Verschiedene Symptome und Maßnahmen der Ersten Hilfe werden erklärt und über leichtverständliche und skizzierte Anleitungen vermittelt. So kann beim Eintritt eines Notfalls zuvor erlerntes Erste-Hilfe-Wissen möglichst richtig und zielgerichtet angewendet werden. Ferner informiert ein Themenbereich zu Kinderkrankheiten.

- Arzt- und Apothekensuche
Die App ermöglicht eine schnelle und standortgenaue Suche nach Kinder- und Jugendärzten sowie Notfallambulanzen und Apotheken.

- Notruffunktion
Ein Notruf kann über die Kindernotfall-App schnell abgesetzt werden. Darüber hinaus helfen die angegebenen "5 W-Fragen" dabei, genau die Informationen anzugeben, die im Falle des Notrufes wichtig sind.

- Gefahren vorbeugen und präventiv handeln
Die Kindernotfall-App hilft mit intuitiven Checklisten und umfangreichen Informationen dabei, Unfällen und Notsituationen bestmöglich vorzubeugen, damit diese gar nicht erst entstehen können.

Die App basiert auf nationalen und internationalen Richtlinien des europäischen und deutschen Resuscitation Councils sowie den Informationen und Erfahrungen der bundesweiten "Erste Hilfe am Kind"-Kurse der Johanniter-Unfall-Hilfe. Wissenschaftlicher Partner für die Entwicklung der App ist das Universitätsklinikum Münster. Die Kindernotfall-App ist ein Ratgeber für junge Eltern und alle, die mit Kindern umgehen, und soll helfen, zuvor in einem Erste Hilfe-Kurs erlernte Fähigkeiten sicher anzuwenden.

Mehr Informationen zur App finden Sie unter:
https://www.barmer.de/unsere-leistungen/apps-skills/kindernotfall-app

title: WikEM - Emergency Medicine
description:
WikEM, The Global Emergency Medicine Wiki, is a point-of-care reference available on the web or via our dedicated mobile applications. Its emergency medicine knowledge base has thousands of quick problem-specific notes to help you care for patients, which is one of the reasons it has been downloaded by more than 100,000 users and is one of the top 10 most popular emergency medicine websites.  

Supported by the nonprofit OpenEM Foundation, WikEM provides a way for medical practitioners to organize online content and cross-reference clinical information at http://www.wikem.org.  If you are a medical practitioner, join our contributor community and help edit our content.  WikEM is intended for clinicians only and not directly for patients.

WikEM serves a wide range of medical practitioners predominantly among the specialties of emergency medicine, pediatric emergency medicine, critical care, emergency medical services (EMS), and urgent care medicine, as well as primary healthcare fields such as family medicine, internal medicine, and pediatrics.  Numerous sources have named WikEM as a key reference for emergency practitioners, ranging from EMTs, paramedics, and other first responders to nurses, nurse practitioners, physician assistants, and emergency physicians.

title: Ambulance Rescue 911
description:
There has been a massive accident and you’re the on-duty ambulance driver. You need to get in your ambulance and drive the doctor to the injured ones as fast as you can. Rush your ambulance around the city to get to the scene of accident in time or you’ll fail to save someones life. Driving them to safety on the ambulance and providing first aid is the best thing you can do to save them in this state of emergency. Turn on the sirens and push the throttle.

Features:

- 4 Different powerful ambulances with lights and siren 
- Real world 3D environment
- Realistic controls
- Different camera angles that give you more control
- Amazing background sound to enhance your gaming experience
- 20 Challenging city levels to test driving skills
-  Mini Map Guide for player, accident and hospital position
- Emergency Quick Response
- User friendly interface and free to download.

title: 911 Operator
description:
In 911 OPERATOR, you take on the role of an emergency dispatcher, who has to rapidly deal with the incoming reports. Your task is not just to pick up the calls, but also to react appropriately to the situation – sometimes giving first aid instructions is enough, at other times a police, fire department or paramedics’ intervention is a necessity. Keep in mind, that the person on the other side of the line might turn out to be a dying daughter’s father, an unpredictable terrorist, or just a prankster. Can you handle all of this?

PLAY ON ANY CITY IN THE WORLD*

Check out thousands of cities from all around the world. The Free Play mode lets you choose a city to play on - the game will download its map, along with real streets, addresses and the emergency infrastructure. You can also try the Career mode, which contains 6 cities with unique events – survive an earthquake in San Francisco and save Washington, D.C. from bomb attacks.

MANAGE TEAMS

A number of police, fire department and paramedic units are at your disposal. The forces may use a variety of vehicles (from common ambulances to police helicopters), essential equipment (e.g., bulletproof vests, first aid kits and technical tools) and consist of team members with different abilities.

PEOPLE’S LIVES ARE IN YOUR HANDS!

Main features:

- Over 50 recorded dialogues inspired by real calls: serious and dramatic, but sometimes also funny or annoying.
- Real First Aid instructions.
- Opportunity to play on any city in the world!
- 6 selected cities in Career mode, featuring unique calls and events.
- More than 140 types of reports to encounter.
- 12 types of emergency vehicles (including helicopters, police cars and motorcycles).

PRIZES:
- BEST INDIE GAME - Digital Dragons 2016
- BEST SERIOUS GAME - Game Development World Championship 2016
- COMMUNITY CHOICE - Game Development World Championship 2016
- BEST PC DOWNLOADABLE - Game Connection 2017

***
The game requires Internet connection to download free maps. The offline game is available after downloading the maps.

All map data © OpenStreetMap authors

* The term “city” is used within the meaning of OpenStreetMap service and relates to urban areas described as “city” or “town” therein.

comments: Love this. Gameplay in all ways (freeplay and campaign) is very fun and challenging. I haven't played any other formats of this (laptop/PC), but it is still very good. The only thing I could think of to add is another few expansions allowing more types of disasters, like a plane crash or a nuclear bomb being detonated (on the bigger cities like New York and Washington DC). But in any case, the game is good enough as it is. Will always be a favourite.

112 isn't compatible with my device, which is sad, my laptop barely runs it and would never manage expansions. My LGV20 couldn't do it and I was crushed. But I'm still grateful to have 911. All the expansions on my PC 911 - which runs with zero issues, I'll get them all eventually on cell. This series is one of my favorite to date. Highly addicting, endlessly playable, actually runs smoothest on my LGV20. Still crushed about 112 but 911 is a comfort.

It has some control issues because it's a direct port of a computer game with no modification for mobile. And there's all this stuff you can buy but it doesn't tell you what any of it does. But it's addicting, endless fun answering 911 calls and deciding what to do and then dispatching units. The calls can get repetitive but there are DLC. Overall a lot of fun and I'm not even sure why. But I love it. It's one of the few mobile games I've liked.

Great App, however gets rather boring after a week of playing as calls and scenarios are the same thing. I've purchased all DLC's and the events are great. The game is fun after days of playing but then the calls repeat. The events are great but I feel like this game isn't worth it. It would also be much more fun if we had the option to choose events if we wanted too on free game mode. This game is fun and addictive, but it needs more calls and additional stuff. I would pay for another DLC.

Not sure if I'm having unique problems, but half of this game's features don't seem to work for me. I can't make new teams, can't move between windows or scroll down in the shop. Interface is very clunky in general. Played one game and it was also not what I was expecting it to be. Refunded.

title: دليل الإسعافات الأولية الطوارئ
description:
الإسعافات الأولية لها دور هام في إنقاذ حياة الأشخاص الذين يتعرضون لحوادث قد تودي بحياتهم، إن لم يتم إسعافهم في الوقت المحدد، ومن هنا تكمن أهميتها، حيث يتعرض الكثير من الأشخاص إلى الموت، بسبب حالات طبية لم تكن تحتاج إلا لتدخل سريع، والقيام ببعض الإسعافات الأولية التي يمكن للمرء تعلمها ببساطة وفي زمن لا يذكر.

وفي هذا العصر، لا تفارق الهواتف الذكية جيوب وأيادي المستخدمين في كل مكان، وانطلاقًا من هذا الأمر، فمن الممكن أن يكون لهذا الجهاز الذي يساعدك على التواصل مع الآخرين، والترفيه عن نفسك، دورًا في إنقاذ حياة الناس.

تطبيق دليل الإسعافات الأولية والطوارئ يمكنك من فهم حالات الإسعافات الأولية، وكيفية القيام بها، ويتضمن شرح مبسط باللغة العربية للحالات الشائعة التي تتطلب إسعافات أولية، مثل حالات الاختناق، والنزيف، والحروق، والغرق، والتسمم، واللدغات، والتشنجات، والإغماأت، وتدريبات تٌكسب المرء مهارات القيام بعمليات الإسعاف.

الإسعافات الأولية و دليل الاسعافات الاولية , تعلم طرق الإسعافات , التدريب على الإسعافات , الاسعافات الاوليه الهلال الاحمر. 
Premiers Secours , Isaafat awalia , First Aid , Is3afate awalia , Red Crescent , hilal ahmar.

title: NA 998
description:
Request an Emergency Ambulance to your location and First Aid Advice at your fingertips with NA 998 App

The comprehensive emergency App from National Ambulance available in both Arabic and English has features for requesting an ambulance, location identification and lifesaving first aid advice; all at your fingertips. 

Directly linked to the 998 Emergency Ambulance number, the App allows users to request an ambulance from locations within National Ambulance service area in the UAE,  whilst also provides their location coordinates to the National Ambulance Communication Center in the UAE; vital in emergency situations. 

The App also includes handy first aid tips via easy to follow instructions and graphics, allowing smart phone users access to first aid advice for handling the different types of emergencies they may come across.

User registration is mandatory for accessing the App. First Aid Guide is accessible to all users while the Emergency Ambulance Request is only available in the areas covered by National Ambulance in the UAE. (Sharjah, Ras Al-Khaimah, Fujairah, Ajman, Umm Al Quwain).

The National Ambulance 998 Application (NA 998) was developed by National Ambulance LLC, United Arab Emirates.

Application features include:
1.	Requesting an Emergency Ambulance based on user’s geographical location
2.	First Aid Guide
3.	Request History
4.	Call 998 – National Ambulance Communication Center
5.	User Profile
6.	Language Selection
7.	Feedback
8.	About us

title: first aid exposed to tear gas
description:
"Often used tear gas to disperse the crowd by security officers. Bullets tear gas included in a chemical weapon that causes eye pain and suffocating breathing.

Gas released this bullet also often irritate the skin, bleeding, and the most severe cause blindness. Skin irritation caused by a chemical gas is perceived as the pain in the eyes, skin, mouth, lungs, and other organs affected by the smoke.

Tear gas was first used in World War I in chemical warfare. However, because the effect is short-term and rarely disabling, gas began to be used by law enforcement agencies as a means to disperse the mob, immobilize rioters, and dispose of the armed suspect without the use of lethal force.

This application provides a way to eliminate the effects of tear gas, a lot of tips that appear in this application so that the effects of tear gas is not harmful."
Hopefully this app useful to you.
thank you
